translation.en: [Lorelai] Please, Luke. Please, please, please.
translation.zh: 求你了 卢克 求你了

translation.en: [Luke] How many cups have you had this morning?
translation.zh: 你今早喝了几杯了？

translation.en: -[Lorelai] None. -[Luke] Plus?
translation.zh: -零 -加几？

translation.en: [Lorelai] Five, but yours is better.
translation.zh: 五杯 但你的更好喝

translation.en: [Rory] I got a kissed. And I shoplifted.
translation.zh: 我被亲了 还偷了商店里的东西

translation.en: [Emily] Honestly, Lorelai,
translation.zh: 说实话 罗蕾莱

translation.en: it's not your looks that keep them away. Think about that.
translation.zh: 不是你的长相让他们不接近你 想想吧

translation.en: [Richard] People die, we pay. People crash cars, we pay.
translation.zh: 人们去世 我们付钱 人们撞车 我们付钱

translation.en: People lose a foot, we pay.
translation.zh: 人们没了脚 我们付钱

translation.en: [Lorelai] At least you have your new slogan.
translation.zh: 至少你们现在有新的广告语

translation.en: -[Rory] Did you do something slutty? -[Lorelai] I'm not that happy.
translation.zh: -你交桃花运了？ -那也不会这么高兴

translation.en: [Michel] People are particularly stupid today.
translation.zh: 人们今天特别的愚蠢

translation.en: -[Lorelai] Copper boom! -[Sookie] Norman Mailer, I'm pregnant!
translation.zh: -赶紧的！ -诺曼梅勒 我怀…

translation.en: -[Rory] Luke can waltz? -[Lorelai] Luke can waltz.
translation.zh: -卢克会华尔兹？ -卢克跳得很好

translation.en: [Luke] I just want you to know I'm in. I am all in.
translation.zh: 我想让你知道我是认真的 我全心投入

translation.en: [Lorelai] It'd be like the first 15 minutes of Saving Private Ryan,
translation.zh: 会像《拯救大兵瑞恩》 开始的15分钟那样惨烈

translation.en: but at least those guys got to be in France.
translation.zh: 但是至少他们进入了法国

translation.en: [Paris] I am not going to Harvard. I had sex, but I'm not going to Harvard!
translation.zh: 我有过性关系 但我上不了哈佛大学

translation.en: [Lorelai] I stopped being a child the minute the strip turned pink.
translation.zh: 试纸变成粉色的那一刻 我就不再是孩子了

translation.en: [Rory] You jump, I jump, Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克 你跳我就跳

translation.en: [Lane] Eternal damnation is what I'm risking for my rock and roll.
translation.zh: 我冒着被打入地狱的风险 在玩摇滚啊

translation.en: [Lorelai] Oy with the poodles already.
translation.zh: “贵宾犬已经够烦的了”

translation.en: [Rory] Because I love you, you idiot.
translation.zh: 因为我爱你 你个白痴

translation.en: [Lorelai] I smell snow.
translation.zh: 我闻到雪的味道

translation.en: -Hey! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: That's how you look when you get off a plane?
translation.zh: 你下飞机时就是这个样子？

translation.en: That's how you say hello?
translation.zh: 你就这样跟我打招呼？

translation.en: You've been stuffed in a tin can for seven hours surrounded by people
translation.zh: 你被塞在一个周围满是人的 罐头盒里七个小时

translation.en: with consumption, diphtheria, scabies, hummus dip, rabid dogs,
translation.zh: 有肺痨的 有白喉的 有长疥疮的 有鹰嘴豆泥酱 有狂犬病

translation.en: drugged up children attacking your chair, stealing your change.
translation.zh: 吸过毒的小孩攻击你的座椅 偷走你的零钱

translation.en: -What airline are you flying? -You should look drawn and blotchy.
translation.zh: -你坐的是哪个航空公司的班机？ -你应该满脸憔悴 满身污渍

translation.en: You should be singing "I Dreamed a Dream" with a bad haircut
translation.zh: 你应该顶着难看的发型 唱着《我曾有梦》

translation.en: while selling yourself to a bunch of French dockworkers.
translation.zh: 跟一群法国码头工人推销自己

translation.en: Instead, you look perfect. Admit it. You've been gooped.
translation.zh: 相反 你看起来太完美了 承认吧 你肯定嗑嗨了

translation.en: I have not been gooped.
translation.zh: 我没有嗑嗨

translation.en: You're doing yoga in the aisles in cashmere sweatpants
translation.zh: 你穿着羊绒运动裤 在走廊里做瑜伽

translation.en: while your comfort dog watches Zoolander 2 on his watch.
translation.zh: 而你的狗狗用自己的表 看《超级名模2》

translation.en: I do blood clot prevention foot pumps
translation.zh: 我用阻止血凝块脚踏泵时

translation.en: wearing my Yonah Schimmel Knishery baseball cap
translation.zh: 戴着我的犹太馅饼屋棒球帽

translation.en: while toothpaste dries up a zit on my chin.
translation.zh: 脸颊一颗青春痘上还有点干牙膏

translation.en: [sighs] Wow! Winded!
translation.zh: 差点喘不过气！

translation.en: -Haven't done that for a while. -Felt good.
translation.zh: -好久没这样了 -感觉很好

translation.en: -I've missed you, kid. -Missed you, too.
translation.zh: -我想你 孩子 -我也想你

translation.en: -How long's it been? -Feels like years.
translation.zh: -有多久了？ -感觉有好几年了

translation.en: -[sighs] Coffee and tacos. -Princess Charlotte iced tea spoons.
translation.zh: 咖啡和玉米饼 夏洛特公主冰茶匙

translation.en: All right, shall we get it out of the way?
translation.zh: 我们可以先不管它吗？

translation.en: Might as well.
translation.zh: 就这样吧

translation.en: One day? That's all?
translation.zh: 一天？就这么多？

translation.en: I'm sorry!
translation.zh: 对不起！

translation.en: You miss Christmas and Thanksgiving and all I get is a one day visit?
translation.zh: 你错过了圣诞节和感恩节 就只来看我一天？

translation.en: What am I, chopped liver?
translation.zh: 我就这么不重要？

translation.en: I have to be on the red-eye to London tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天必须去赶伦敦的夜班飞机

translation.en: -London again. -For work.
translation.zh: -又是伦敦 -是为了工作

translation.en: ♪ And the cat's in the cradle And the silver spoon ♪
translation.zh: 摇篮里的猫 银汤匙

translation.en: -Oh, now, Emily. -Oh, wow! Nicely played.
translation.zh: 好了 艾米丽 演得不错 好了 你赢了

translation.en: All right, you win.
translation.zh: 演得不错 好了 你赢了

translation.en: We have limited time. Should we skip the town tour?
translation.zh: 我们时间有限 能不讲小镇的事了吗？

translation.en: -We can't skip the town tour. -Well, we'll keep it short.
translation.zh: -不能不讲小镇的事 -那就时间短点

translation.en: -Le Chat Club closed due to rats. -Again?
translation.zh: -猫咪俱乐部因为鼠害关门了 -又一次？

translation.en: -We got parking meters. -Where?
translation.zh: -新装了停车计时器 -在哪里？

translation.en: No one would pay so they took them out.
translation.zh: 没人付钱 所以他们又拆掉了

translation.en: This town is mob ruled.
translation.zh: 这个镇暴民统治啊

translation.en: Al's Pancake World won best Christmas decorations again.
translation.zh: 艾尔的煎饼世界 又一次赢得了最佳圣诞装饰奖

translation.en: It's that nativity scene with eggplant Jesus.
translation.zh: 是用茄子做成耶稣诞生的场景

translation.en: -You can't beat it. -There's a debate
translation.zh: -真是必胜无疑 -关于是不是应该

translation.en: about taking the phone booth out.
translation.zh: 拆掉电话亭产生过争论

translation.en: Where would Superman change
translation.zh: 但超人若想救我们

translation.en: when he comes to save our town from Ben Affleck?
translation.zh: 不受本阿弗莱克的迫害 他上哪换衣服呢？

translation.en: -I made the same excellent point. -What's with the signs?
translation.zh: 我也睿智地指出了这一点 那些标语怎么样了？

translation.en: Ooh, I saved the best for last.
translation.zh: 我把最好的留到最后说

translation.en: Taylor has decided that septic systems are beneath us
translation.zh: 泰勒认为化粪池系统要建在地下

translation.en: -and he wants to go full-on sewer. -How can we do that?
translation.zh: -他想要全套下水道 -我们怎么才能做到呢？

translation.en: He's going door to door collecting people's septic tank horror stories.
translation.zh: 他挨家挨户地收集 关于化粪池的恐怖故事

translation.en: -Oh, Lord! -Then, he'll compile them,
translation.zh: -天啊！ -将它们汇编到一起

translation.en: then he and a panel will stage testimonial re-enactments for the county assessor.
translation.zh: 然后他和一个座谈小组 重演给郡里的评审员看

translation.en: Are you telling me this to get me to stay longer?
translation.zh: 你说这个是想让我待久点？

translation.en: -Is it working? -Kind of.
translation.zh: -有用吗？ -有点

translation.en: Hi, Miss Patty!
translation.zh: 嗨 贝蒂小姐！

translation.en: Rory! You look fabulous!
translation.zh: （贝蒂小姐芭蕾学校） 萝莉！你真漂亮！

translation.en: -She just got off a plane! -[cell phone vibrates]
translation.zh: 她刚下飞机！

translation.en: Oh! That's my work phone.
translation.zh: 是我的工作电话

translation.en: -It's not ringing. -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: -它没响 -我知道

translation.en: -It's not ringing, either. -I know.
translation.zh: -它也没响 -我知道

translation.en: -You've got more burners than Omar Little. -I got a personal phone, a work phone,
translation.zh: 你比奥马利特手机都多 我有一个私人手机 一个工作手机

translation.en: and the phone that gets reception in Stars Hollow. Theoretically.
translation.zh: 还有专门接听斯德霍洛的手机 理论上是这样

translation.en: The fact that the entire town was actually constructed
translation.zh: 其实 整个小镇是建在一个 巨大雪球上面

translation.en: in a giant snow globe probably has an effect on your bar count.
translation.zh: 这对你的信号多少有些影响

translation.en: Hello? Hello? Um...
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [sighs] Damn! Hello?
translation.zh: 该死！喂？

translation.en: You're breaking up.
translation.zh: 你听着信号不好

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Hello? [grunts]
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Hold on! Hello?
translation.zh: 等会儿！喂？

translation.en: Crap! Hello?
translation.zh: 该死！喂？

translation.en: Hi, can you hear me now? Can you hear me--
translation.zh: 嗨 你现在能听到我吗？ 你能听到…

translation.en: Yes! Hi! Great!
translation.zh: 耶！嗨！太棒了！

translation.en: Um, so, how are you?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: Hello? [groans]
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: I'm heading to the trees! I'm... I'm heading to the trees.
translation.zh: 我正在朝着树走！

translation.en: Okay, I'm at the trees. Hello? Hello?
translation.zh: 好 我到了树边了 喂？

translation.en: I'm gonna try Doose's. You coming?
translation.zh: 我要去试试多泽超市 你来吗？

translation.en: -Nah! I just hit my steps. -Okay.
translation.zh: -不！我跑不动了 -好

translation.en: Um, hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Are you still there? Okay, flip phone!
translation.zh: 你还在吗？好吧 翻盖电话！

translation.en: Hi! Sorry, it's Rory Gilmore again. I think Ingrid just--
translation.zh: 嗨！对不起 还是萝莉吉尔摩 我想英格丽德只是…

translation.en: Hello? Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [sighs] Hello? Crap!
translation.zh: 喂？该死！

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Oh, yes! Sure, she can.
translation.zh: 对！她当然可以

translation.en: Okay, on this number, please. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好 请打这个号码 谢谢

translation.en: Rory! Hey! I didn't know you were coming in today.
translation.zh: 萝莉！嘿！我不知道你今天会来

translation.en: Oh, it's just a super quick in and out.
translation.zh: 只是来看一眼

translation.en: -Cabbage. -What? Oh.
translation.zh: -卷心菜 -什么？

translation.en: Come again.
translation.zh: 欢迎惠顾

translation.en: Um, so tell me, what is going on with you?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你怎么了？

translation.en: -Oh, you don't wanna know. -Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 你不会想知道的

translation.en: -Yeah, Zach got a promotion. -My God! Why?
translation.zh: -对 扎克升职了 -天啊！为什么？

translation.en: -I don't know. I think they like him. -Poor guy.
translation.zh: -不知道 我想是他们喜欢他 -可怜的人

translation.en: Yeah, he's a route supervisor now. Has to wear a tie.
translation.zh: 是啊 他现在线路主管了 必须要打领带

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -[sighs] It's fairly devastating.
translation.zh: 我真难过 太惨了 我告诉他 他的样子就像年轻时的里奥纳德科恩

translation.en: I tell him he looks like a young Leonard Cohen,
translation.zh: 太惨了 我告诉他 他的样子就像年轻时的里奥纳德科恩

translation.en: but he looks like his dad. -[cell phone vibrates] -Sorry.
translation.zh: -但他实际上就像他爸爸 -对不起

translation.en: -Yeah. -Hello? Oh, Ingrid. Finally!
translation.zh: -是啊 -喂？英格丽德 终于打通了！

translation.en: It's so good to finally connect.
translation.zh: 能联系上真好

translation.en: Lorelai, I'm glad I ran into you.
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱 我很高兴碰见你

translation.en: -Your house is that way, Kirk. -I did not get lost again.
translation.zh: -你家在那边 柯克 -我不是又迷路了

translation.en: I wanted you to know that I've started a new business.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你我开始新生意了

translation.en: It's a ride share business. I call it Ööö-ber.
translation.zh: 是分享交通工具的生意 我称它为欧步

translation.en: Uh-oh. There's already an Uber, Kirk.
translation.zh: 已经有优步了 柯克

translation.en: No, not Uber. Ööö-ber. Three "O's" instead of a "U."
translation.zh: 不 不是优步 欧步 是“欧”不是“优”

translation.en: -Okay, but it's, uh-- -Ööö-ber.
translation.zh: -好吧 可是… -欧步

translation.en: -Right. But it's the-- -Ööö-ber.
translation.zh: -对 可是… -欧步

translation.en: It's a service where people can request a ride and I will pick them up.
translation.zh: 这项服务可以让人们叫车 我去接他们

translation.en: -Like Uber. -Except it's Ööö-ber.
translation.zh: -就像优步 -只是名字叫欧步

translation.en: It's the same thing.
translation.zh: 是一样的东西

translation.en: -No, it's not. -Kirk. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -不 不是的 -柯克

translation.en: People use an app to call a car.
translation.zh: 人们用应用软件叫车

translation.en: -I have no app. -Then how do they get a car?
translation.zh: -我没有应用软件 -他们怎么叫车呢？

translation.en: They call my mother, she calls me, I find a car and I pick them up.
translation.zh: 他们给我妈妈打电话 我妈妈打给我 我找车 然后去接他们

translation.en: -So it's a much worse version of Uber. -And it's pronounced Ööö-ber.
translation.zh: -这可不如优步 -它叫欧步

translation.en: -Stop making that sound. -All right. You've got my mom's number.
translation.zh: -别发那个音 -好吧 你有我妈妈的电话

translation.en: -Now if you'll excuse me... -[pig oinks]
translation.zh: 如果你允许的话 花瓣该睡觉去了

translation.en: -it is past Petal's bedtime. -Bye, Petal.
translation.zh: 如果你允许的话 花瓣该睡觉去了 再见 花瓣

translation.en: When did Kirk get a pig?
translation.zh: 柯克啥时候弄了只猪？

translation.en: Babette heard him and Lulu talking about having a baby,
translation.zh: 芭贝特听到他和露露商量要孩子 全镇都捐助了

translation.en: so the whole town chipped in. It bought us a couple of years.
translation.zh: 芭贝特听到他和露露商量要孩子 全镇都捐助了 这给了我们几年清静日子

translation.en: -Very smart. -Ready?
translation.zh: -真聪明 -准备好了？

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: I'm not really home till I get my Stars Hollow Gazette.
translation.zh: 没拿到《斯德霍洛公报》 我就没准备好回家

translation.en: Christmas edition.
translation.zh: 圣诞版

translation.en: Manger news, Santa's wishes, eggnog checkpoints, and... the Christmas poem.
translation.zh: 马槽新闻 圣诞老人愿望 蛋酒检查点以及圣诞诗歌

translation.en: -Same one every year. -Every single year.
translation.zh: -每年都是一样的 -年年如此

translation.en: So good to be home.
translation.zh: 回家真好

translation.en: -What? -[sniffs and sighs]
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I smell snow.
translation.zh: 我闻到雪的味道

translation.en: [troubadour] ♪ Nothing looks so pretty as ♪
translation.zh: 世上最美的

translation.en: ♪ The winter stars a-glittering ♪
translation.zh: 就是冬日闪烁的星星

translation.en: ♪ Shining on a freshly fallen snow ♪
translation.zh: 照耀着刚下的雪

translation.en: ♪ When the blue light of the moon ♪
translation.zh: 当蓝色的月光

translation.en: ♪ Is giving off a loving winter glow ♪
translation.zh: 映出美丽的冬景

translation.en: ♪ Such a tender feeling when ♪
translation.zh: 当烛光掩映

translation.en: ♪ The candlelight a-flickering ♪
translation.zh: 内心充满柔情

translation.en: ♪ The ember window calls you home ♪
translation.zh: 窗户在召唤你回家

translation.en: ♪ And the fireplace is crackling ♪
translation.zh: 壁炉在噼啪作响

translation.en: ♪ And giving off a warming winter glow ♪
translation.zh: 放出冬天里的温暖光芒

translation.en: ♪ Summer with its nights That last forever has its charm ♪
translation.zh: 夏日的夜晚 永远魅力无限

translation.en: ♪ Fall with golden leaves That gather, too ♪
translation.zh: 秋日的落叶也令人赞叹

translation.en: ♪ Spring is all the brighter After rip storms have blown ♪
translation.zh: 暴雨过后的春天更加明媚

translation.en: ♪ But winter has a magic of its own ♪
translation.zh: 但冬天别具一番神韵

translation.en: -[Lorelai] Got it? -[Rory] Yup.
translation.zh: -拿到了？ -是

translation.en: [Lorelai] Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你确定？

translation.en: -[Rory] Oh, yes. -Come on. Let's get in out of the snow!
translation.zh: -是 -来 咱们别站雪里 进屋去吧！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 走吧！

translation.en: [in sing-song] Luke's gonna be so excited to see you.
translation.zh: 卢克看到你会很兴奋的

translation.en: -[Rory] I can't wait to see him. -[Lorelai sighs]
translation.zh: 我等不及见到他了

translation.en: -Hello, Rabbi. -[jingle plays]
translation.zh: 你好 拉比

translation.en: Oh, Paul Anka, what is she making you wear now?
translation.zh: 保罗安加 她这是让你穿的什么？

translation.en: No, no. This one was his idea.
translation.zh: 不 这是他的主意

translation.en: Aw, don't feel bad. She did the same thing to me.
translation.zh: 不要感觉不好 她对我也这样

translation.en: -Okay, get ready. -For what?
translation.zh: -好 准备好 -准备什么？

translation.en: -Super-proud Luke. -What?
translation.zh: -超级自豪的卢克 -什么？

translation.en: Luke! It's a Christmas miracle!
translation.zh: 卢克！圣诞奇迹！

translation.en: -Ah! There she is, the New Yorker writer! -Super-proud!
translation.zh: -《纽约客》的作家来了！ -超级自豪！

translation.en: It was just one Talk of the Town piece.
translation.zh: 只是一篇“街谈巷议”的文章

translation.en: Oh, one Talk of the Town piece? Come on.
translation.zh: 一篇“街谈巷议”？拜托

translation.en: It was terrific. And that woman you wrote about--
translation.zh: 它太棒了！你写的那个女人…

translation.en: -Naomi Shropshire. -Yes! I've never heard of her.
translation.zh: -诺米什罗浦希尔 -对！ 我从未听说过她 现在我觉得我见过她

translation.en: -Now I feel like I've met her. -I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 我从未听说过她 现在我觉得我见过她 谢谢你

translation.en: I've never read the New Yorker before, but now, every week.
translation.zh: 我以前从没听说过《纽约客》 可是现在每周都看

translation.en: I'm glad.
translation.zh: 我很高兴

translation.en: I subscribed to it. Who says print is dead?
translation.zh: 我订阅了 谁说印刷业消亡了？

translation.en: -Only the world. -Well, what does the world--
translation.zh: -全世界都这么说 -那全世界…

translation.en: -You're eating? -Just tacos.
translation.zh: -你在吃东西？ -只是玉米饼

translation.en: -Tacos are tiny. -I'm making dinner.
translation.zh: -玉米饼很小 -我在做晚饭

translation.en: -Wow. So I'm fat? -What?
translation.zh: -我很胖？ -什么？

translation.en: -Body shaming. -I am not body shaming.
translation.zh: -对身材感到羞耻 -我才不会

translation.en: -Trigger warnings! -Oh, for Christ's sake.
translation.zh: -触发警报！ -不要啊

translation.en: -War on Christmas! -I am making two main courses
translation.zh: 圣诞节开战！ 我做了两道主菜 因为你要我这样做

translation.en: because you told me to make two main courses.
translation.zh: 我做了两道主菜 因为你要我这样做

translation.en: -What two main courses? -Mac and cheese, parmesan cutlets...
translation.zh: -什么主菜？ -奶酪通心粉 帕尔马干酪肉饼…

translation.en: -With garlic bread? -And tater tots!
translation.zh: -配蒜蓉面包？ -还有马铃薯饼！

translation.en: I am not making tater tots.
translation.zh: 我不做马铃薯饼

translation.en: -Why not? -We need sustenance!
translation.zh: -我们需要食物！ -你在吃玉米饼！

translation.en: -You're eating tacos! -Tater tots go great with tacos.
translation.zh: -我们需要食物！ -你在吃玉米饼！ -马铃薯饼配玉米饼很棒 -玉米饼里放马铃薯饼很棒

translation.en: Tater tots are great in tacos.
translation.zh: -马铃薯饼配玉米饼很棒 -玉米饼里放马铃薯饼很棒

translation.en: -Yes! -[Luke] No!
-Hey! I mean it! -They're organic.
translation.zh: -我讲真的！ -是有机的

translation.en: All right, negotiation's over! Put the tater tots back, finish your tacos,
translation.zh: 谈判结束！把马铃薯饼放回去 把玉米饼吃完

translation.en: wash your hands, dinner's almost ready!
translation.zh: 去洗手 晚饭就快好了！

translation.en: Ah! And I saw you grab those mini donuts. Put 'em down right now.
translation.zh: 我看到你拿了迷你甜甜圈 快放回去

translation.en: I cannot believe the conversations I have in this room.
translation.zh: 真没法相信这些对话

translation.en: I thought cooking was supposed to be relaxing.
translation.zh: 烹饪不是让人放松的吗？

translation.en: -[pop song playing] -Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不 你只是…

translation.en: Don't put that song on and disappear into Rory's room. Hey!
translation.zh: 不要放上那支歌 然后就溜到萝莉房间里去

translation.en: At least turn it down!
translation.zh: 至少小声点！

translation.en: -Did my boxes get here? -Behind the rack.
translation.zh: -我箱子到没？ -在架子后面

translation.en: Great!
translation.zh: 真棒！

translation.en: So, you finally did it, huh? Finally gave up the Brooklyn pad?
translation.zh: 你终于做到了 嗯？ 终于放弃布鲁克林那个位置了？

translation.en: I did. Lena Dunham will just have to get along without me.
translation.zh: 是啊 莉娜杜汉姆指望不上我了

translation.en: -Are you gonna miss it? -A little.
translation.zh: -你还会想念吗？ -有点儿吧

translation.en: I'm gonna miss it.
translation.zh: 我会想念的

translation.en: It had that early American tenement shtetl slash Trainspotting vibe
translation.zh: 那里有种早期美国租户区 《猜火车》的氛围

translation.en: that every mother wants for her little girl.
translation.zh: 所有的妈妈都想给女儿那样的环境

translation.en: It was a perfectly decent apartment.
translation.zh: 是非常体面的公寓

translation.en: I liked how you had to avoid the walls or you'd stick to them.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你必须躲着墙走 否则就会被粘上

translation.en: -One wall. -See, in some apartments,
translation.zh: -一面墙 -在某些公寓里

translation.en: you don't have to avoid any walls.
translation.zh: 不用避开任何墙

translation.en: It was a great place. I just was never there.
translation.zh: 是很好的地方 我从来没去过

translation.en: Do you know how many nights I spent there this year?
translation.zh: 我知道我今年 在那里待了多少个晚上吗？

translation.en: -Three? Eighteen? -No. No.
-Forty-six? -No.
Is this The Price is Right? If I'm a little under I win, over, I lose?
translation.zh: -错 -像《购物街》 我说得偏低点就赢了 超了就输了？

translation.en: I don't know exactly how many nights, okay?
translation.zh: 我并不知道具体有多少个晚上

translation.en: It was not a lot. Now the building's going condo.
translation.zh: 但不多 现在那幢楼变成共管公寓了

translation.en: I'm not ready to buy a condo, so it seemed like the time to say...
translation.zh: 我没想要买共管公寓 所以是时候说…

translation.en: -Bye-bye, Brooklyn. -Bye-bye, Brooklyn.
translation.zh: -再见 布鲁克林 -再见 布鲁克林

translation.en: This box is open.
translation.zh: 这个箱子打开了

translation.en: -[gasps] Damn that TSA! -Really? You went through my stuff?
translation.zh: -该死的运输安全管理局！ -真的？你看了我的东西？

translation.en: I did. And I must say, I found it very disappointing.
translation.zh: 我看了 不得不说 我觉得非常失望

translation.en: You found my personal items disappointing?
translation.zh: 你觉得我的私人用品令人失望？

translation.en: I thought there'd be something fun in there,
translation.zh: 我以为会有好玩的东西

translation.en: like a treasure map or the prequel to Huckleberry Finn
translation.zh: 比如藏宝图 或是《费恩历险记》的前篇

translation.en: where Huck is a Klan leader and terrified of water.
translation.zh: 里面说哈克是三K党领袖 还怕水

translation.en: I think it's kind of exciting, you know?
translation.zh: 我觉得那很刺激

translation.en: No apartment, no rent, no ties.
translation.zh: 没有公寓 没有租金 没有牵绊

translation.en: I could crash here, I could crash at Lane's.
translation.zh: 我可以睡在这里 可以睡在莱恩家

translation.en: I feel like this is my time to be rootless and just see where life takes me,
translation.zh: 我觉得可以漂泊一段时间 看看命运把我带向何方

translation.en: and travel wherever there's a story to write.
translation.zh: 到可以有故事写的地方去旅行

translation.en: I just wish I had remembered to label my boxes
translation.zh: 我只希望当时 给箱子上贴个标签就好了

translation.en: because now I know where nothing is.
translation.zh: 因为我现在不知道东西都在哪里

translation.en: My boots, my coats, my underwear...
translation.zh: 我的靴子 外套 内衣…

translation.en: -You don't know where your underwear is? -Could be at Lane's.
translation.zh: 你不知道自己的内衣在哪里？ 或许在莱恩家

translation.en: You've been without your underwear since you moved? Don't judge.
translation.zh: -你搬家后就没穿过内衣？ -不要评判我

translation.en: I'm Gwen freakin' Stefani. Want to borrow some underwear?
translation.zh: 我是可怕的格温史蒂芬妮 你要借内衣吗？

translation.en: I'd like to stop talking about underwear. I'm looking for my lucky outfit.
translation.zh: 不想说这个了 我在找我的幸运装

translation.en: Any outfit you wear without underwear will be your lucky outfit.
translation.zh: 所有不穿内衣时穿的衣服都是幸运装

translation.en: I have a big meeting with Condé Nast
translation.zh: 我和康泰纳仕有个重要会面

translation.en: and I have this look that makes me feel like Diane Sawyer.
translation.zh: 我有件衣服让我觉得自己是黛安索耶

translation.en: Is it a Mike Nichols mask?
translation.zh: 迈克尼科尔斯的面具？

translation.en: -[doorbell rings] -[Luke] I'll get it!
translation.zh: 我来！

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Oh! That is a box of New Yorker magazines with your fancy piece in it.
translation.zh: 这个盒子里是《纽约客》杂志 里面有你喜欢的文章

translation.en: Box one of six.
translation.zh: 六个盒子之一

translation.en: -You're kidding. -Super-proud!
translation.zh: -你开玩笑吧？ -超级自豪！

translation.en: Hey, that guy's here.
translation.zh: 嘿 那个人来了

translation.en: -What guy? -[stutters] You know... uh, Jeffrey.
translation.zh: -什么人？ -你知道 杰弗里

translation.en: -Who? Who? -Allen? Billy?
translation.zh: -谁？ -艾伦？比利？

translation.en: There's nothing remotely similar about those names.
translation.zh: 这些名字根本就没什么相似之处

translation.en: -You know. Him. Your guy. -Paul?
translation.zh: -你知道 就是你那个人 -保罗？

translation.en: -Paul. Yes, Paul. -Paul's not here.
translation.zh: -对 保罗 -保罗不在这

translation.en: -[Luke] Paul's here. -Who's Paul?
translation.zh: -他在 -是谁啊？

translation.en: Paul, my... Paul, my boyfriend? Oh, crap! Paul is here!
translation.zh: 保罗 我男朋友？该死！保罗来了！

translation.en: -Why is Paul here? -[Rory] I invited him for dinner,
translation.zh: -保罗为什么来这里？ -我请他来吃晚饭 我忘了

translation.en: and I totally forgot. Crap, crap, crap!
translation.zh: -保罗为什么来这里？ -我请他来吃晚饭 我忘了 该死！

translation.en: I can't believe you forgot Rory's boyfriend Paul.
translation.zh: 我没法相信 你忘记了萝莉的男朋友保罗

translation.en: [chuckles] You came.
translation.zh: 你来了

translation.en: -Of course I came. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我当然来了

translation.en: -For you. -So beautiful.
translation.zh: -送给你的 -太美了

translation.en: -And indigenous to Peru. Fun fact. -So fun. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -是秘鲁本土的 很有趣 -真有趣

translation.en: -Hey. Look who's here. -[chuckles] Paul! Wow!
translation.zh: -嘿 看看谁来了 -保罗！哇！

translation.en: -So good to see you. -You, too.
translation.zh: -幸会 -我也是

translation.en: -Thank you for the invite. -Is your hair different?
translation.zh: -谢谢你的邀请 -你做头发了吗？

translation.en: -Uh, no. -Lose some weight?
translation.zh: -没有？ -减体重了？

translation.en: -Nope. -Gain some weight? [chuckles]
translation.zh: -没有 -体重增加了？

translation.en: I'm going to put these in water.
translation.zh: 我把这花放到水里

translation.en: -Come on, Paul. -Yes, I will follow.
translation.zh: -来 保罗 -好 我跟你去

translation.en: I've never seen that boy before.
translation.zh: 我没见过那人

translation.en: -See? -They've been together for months.
translation.zh: -看吧？ -都交往几个月了

translation.en: -I think it's been a year. -He's been to the house!
translation.zh: -我想有一年了 -他来过家里的！

translation.en: -I know! -[sighs]
translation.zh: -我知道！ -他像个超级英雄

translation.en: He's like a superhero, but his power is that you can't remember him
translation.zh: -我知道！ -他像个超级英雄 他的能力就是你记不住他 不管你和他在一起多久

translation.en: no matter how much time you spend with him.
translation.zh: 他的能力就是你记不住他 不管你和他在一起多久

translation.en: Kind of like every Marvel movie ever.
translation.zh: 就像那些漫威电影一样

translation.en: -Care for something to drink, Pete? -Paul.
translation.zh: -喝点什么吗 皮特？ -是保罗

translation.en: Paul. I'm-- [chuckles]
translation.zh: 保罗 我…

translation.en: Pete is our, uh, dog's friend. Our dog's name is Paul.
translation.zh: 皮特是我们狗狗的朋友 我们的狗狗叫保罗

translation.en: -Last name Anka. -Weirdly close to my last name.
translation.zh: -姓安加 -和我的姓很像

translation.en: -Right. Very close. -This is all I could find.
translation.zh: -对 非常像 -我只能找到这个

translation.en: -That'll do. -[chuckles] Okay.
translation.zh: -可以的 -好吧

translation.en: -[Lorelai] Red okay... -Paul.
translation.zh: -红酒行吗… -保罗

translation.en: -I got it now. Paul, red, Paul? -Red sounds good.
translation.zh: -我知道了 保罗 红酒？ -不错

translation.en: -Oh, hey, Luke. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嘿 卢克 -好

translation.en: -I brought it. -You...
translation.zh: -我带来了 -你…

translation.en: The antique wrench we talked about the last time I was here.
translation.zh: 我上次来时谈到的旧扳手

translation.en: -Remember? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 记得吗？

translation.en: We went fishing on your boat.
translation.zh: 我们坐你的船去钓鱼

translation.en: You told me your dad owned a hardware store. Now it's a diner.
translation.zh: 你告诉我你爸爸有个五金店 现在改成餐厅了

translation.en: I told you my grandfather owned a hardware store
translation.zh: 我告诉你我祖父有个五金店

translation.en: and I kept all of his tools?
translation.zh: 他的旧工具我都留着

translation.en: I remember the boat.
translation.zh: 我记得船

translation.en: You said your dad had a wrench that he loved
translation.zh: 你说过你爸爸有个心爱的十字扳手

translation.en: and you wish you'd kept it.
translation.zh: 你多想能保留下来

translation.en: My grandfather also had one that he loved and I did keep it.
translation.zh: 我祖父有一个心爱的 我留下来了

translation.en: I'll go get it.
translation.zh: 我去拿

translation.en: I just forgot the entire conversation we just had.
translation.zh: 我忘了我们有过这段对话了

translation.en: Come on, guys.
translation.zh: 拜托 各位

translation.en: [Paul] Thanks for inviting me over, by the way. I don't get to see a lot of Rory these days.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们邀请我 我最近见萝莉时间不多

translation.en: At least I get to see her for our anniversary, which is great.
translation.zh: 至少我能在纪念日见到她 这样太好了

translation.en: Can you believe it's two years?
translation.zh: 你能相信已经两年了吗？

translation.en: The cotton anniversary.
translation.zh: 棉纪念日？

translation.en: Okay, I got it. Here we go. [sighs]
translation.zh: 好 我知道了 来吧

translation.en: Here it is. Look at the, uh, date on the back.
translation.zh: 给你 看看后面的日期

translation.en: -Oh! And Lorelai... -[Lorelai] Huh?
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱…

translation.en: The virus protection software I told you about.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过的杀毒软件

translation.en: Want me to pop it on your computer?
translation.zh: 想要我给你装一个吗？

translation.en: -Where is it? All right. -Living room.
translation.zh: -在哪？ -起居室

translation.en: It's got the Sadness stickers from Inside Out on it?
translation.zh: 上面有《头脑特工队》里的悲伤贴纸 对吗？

translation.en: -You remembered. -[chuckles] Okay.
translation.zh: -你还记得 -好吧

translation.en: -It's nice that he remembered. -It's nice that somebody remembered.
translation.zh: 他还记得 真好 能有人记得真好

translation.en: This is a very nice wrench.
translation.zh: 这真是把好扳手

translation.en: -What the hell did you do here? -[Lorelai] What?
translation.zh: （节目录像） -你都做了什么？ -什么？

translation.en: The DVR is completely full.
translation.zh: 硬盘录像机满了

translation.en: I have no idea what any of these things are.
translation.zh: 我不知道这都是什么东西

translation.en: Restless Virgins, Deadly Honeymoon...
translation.zh: 《不安的处女》《致命蜜月》…

translation.en: [Lorelai] Lifetime Movie Channel classics.
translation.zh: 一生电影网的经典

translation.en: Killer Crush, Mini's First Time.
translation.zh: 《杀手的陨落》《米尼的第一次》

translation.en: A rebellious girl hooks up with an escort agency
translation.zh: 一个反叛的女孩 勾搭上一个保镖公司的

translation.en: where her stepfather is a client. Alec Baldwin. Pre-yoga.
translation.zh: 而她的继父是这个公司的客户 亚历克鲍德温 做瑜伽之前看的

translation.en: -So, keep? -Keep.
translation.zh: -那留着？ -留着

translation.en: -Okay. Accidental Obsession. -Keep.
translation.zh: -好 《意外迷恋》 -留着

translation.en: -Murder in a College Town. -Keep.
translation.zh: -《大学城谋杀案》 -留着

translation.en: -Crimes of the Mind. -Keep!
translation.zh: -《思想犯罪》 -留着！

translation.en: Fatal Acquittal, Not With My Daughter, Baby Sellers, Unfinished Betrayal,
translation.zh: 《致命无罪》《不能这样对我女儿》 《小卖家》《未完成的背叛》

translation.en: The Girl He Met Online, The Boy He Met Online,
translation.zh: 《网上艳遇》1 2

translation.en: Deadly Vows, Lying Eyes, Lies He Told,
translation.zh: 《死亡的控诉》《说谎的眼睛》 《他的谎言》

translation.en: My Nanny's Secret.
translation.zh: 《我保姆的秘密》

translation.en: Did the remote break? Do we only get one channel now?
translation.zh: 遥控器坏了吗？怎么只有一个频道？

translation.en: -Where's my pajamas? -In the drawer.
translation.zh: -我的睡衣呢？ -在抽屉里

translation.en: -Ugh. Felix... -Oscar...
translation.zh: -菲利克斯… -奥斯卡…

translation.en: I like my pajamas on the chair, all crinkled up and ready for bed,
translation.zh: 我希望我的睡衣放在椅子上 叠好准备穿了睡觉

translation.en: not suffocating in a drawer.
translation.zh: 不是一团塞进抽屉

translation.en: Your pajamas are not puppies.
translation.zh: 你的睡衣又不是小狗

translation.en: You should find my bedtime rituals endearing by now.
translation.zh: 现在你应该发现了 我的睡前仪式非常令人愉快

translation.en: What's taking you so long?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么久？

translation.en: You know, I still can't get over that piece Rory wrote.
translation.zh: 我还是没从萝莉那篇文章中恢复过来

translation.en: Oh, really? 'Cause you've been so stingy with your praise.
translation.zh: 真的？因为你一直吝啬你的赞美

translation.en: Are those...
translation.zh: 这些是…

translation.en: -Puppies! -Right.
translation.zh: -小狗！ -对

translation.en: -That is one great kid you got. -Eh, she's all right.
translation.zh: -你有个好孩子 -她还行吧

translation.en: She's freaked out she's gonna hear our rollicking lovemaking.
translation.zh: 她担心自己会听到 我们热烈的床上运动

translation.en: -[scoffs] What are you doing? -Organizing my magazines by Kardashian.
translation.zh: 你干什么？ 整理卡戴珊的杂志

translation.en: -You're stalling. -I'm organizing.
translation.zh: -你在拖时间 -我在收拾东西

translation.en: You're not going to have your dream tonight.
translation.zh: 你今晚不会再做梦了

translation.en: [grunts] My dirty bathroom dream? Yes, I am.
translation.zh: 肮脏的厕所梦？会的

translation.en: -Just come to bed! -[sighs]
translation.zh: 快来上床！

translation.en: Five nights in a row. Five nights in a row!
translation.zh: 连续五个晚上了！

translation.en: I'm looking for a bathroom and then I find one
translation.zh: 我找厕所 然后找到了一个

translation.en: and it's like the Eastern Promises steam room scene,
translation.zh: 里面就像《东方的承诺》里 蒸汽浴室一样

translation.en: only the stuff on the walls ain't blood.
translation.zh: 只是墙上没有血

translation.en: -Don't think about it. -The bathrooms are all giant.
translation.zh: -别想了 -厕所很大

translation.en: There's stalls and urinals, urinals, urinals... It's a dream!
translation.zh: -里面屎尿横流… -那是做梦！

translation.en: Last night, it was the bathroom at the Radio City Music Hall.
translation.zh: 昨晚 我梦到的是 无线电城音乐厅的厕所

translation.en: -The Rockettes were there. -Okay. -They kept slipping. -I got it.
translation.zh: -火箭女郎在那里 她们总滑倒 -好 我知道了

translation.en: Let's just sleep standing up like cows.
translation.zh: 咱们像奶牛一样站着睡觉吧

translation.en: You come to bed, you can watch one of these ridiculous movies.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 上床来 你可以看个电影

translation.en: -All the way through? -Yes.
translation.zh: -一直看？ -对

translation.en: You won't turn it off when the suspicious sister, co-worker,
translation.zh: 当看到那个姐姐 同事

translation.en: or gay best friend investigates the abandoned cabin by the lake
translation.zh: 或是同性密友调查到 湖边废弃小屋

translation.en: where they find proof to expose the killer
translation.zh: 在那发现了找到凶手的线索

translation.en: and they get hit in the head with a hammer?
translation.zh: 结果头被锤子打了 你不会让我关掉？

translation.en: -Nope. -[gasps] Rory will think we're rollicking.
translation.zh: -不会 -萝莉会以为我们在上床

translation.en: Well, no one ever said she was dumb.
translation.zh: 她又不傻

translation.en: [man on TV] The deal for $49 billion or about $95 per...
translation.zh: 这笔490亿的交易 或是每股95美元…

translation.en: [panting] Don't touch the handle!
translation.zh: 别碰那个把手！

translation.en: [man] ...boards have approved the deal
translation.zh: …董事会同意这笔生意

translation.en: and now begin the long regulatory process that follows.
translation.zh: 现在开始随之而来的漫长的管理程序

translation.en: -All of this-- -[tapping continues]
translation.zh: 所有这些…

translation.en: [woman on laptop] ...four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: …四 五 六 七 八

translation.en: Repeat from the top. A five, six, seven, eight...
translation.zh: 从头再来 五 六 七 八…

translation.en: Shuffle, a three, a five, a seven and a flap.
translation.zh: 曳步 三 五 七 拍地

translation.en: Flap, flap, ball change, flap, flap, flap, again.
translation.zh: 拍地 脚掌换步 拍地 再来

translation.en: Shuffle! A three!
translation.zh: 曳步！三！

translation.en: [Rory] Too loud?
translation.zh: 太吵了？

translation.en: -No. Just loud enough. -Ball change...
translation.zh: -不 吵得刚刚好 -脚掌换步

translation.en: -What you doing? -Stress tap dancing.
translation.zh: -你在干什么？ -减压踢踏舞

translation.en: Helps get out my anxieties. Keeps me calm.
translation.zh: 帮我减少焦虑 让我平静

translation.en: How long have you been tapping your troubles away?
translation.zh: 你已经用踢踏舞减压多久了？

translation.en: About a month. I needed something to shut my brain off.
translation.zh: 差不多一个月了 我需要把大脑也清空

translation.en: I tried meditation. Tried jogging.
translation.zh: 我试过冥想 试过慢跑

translation.en: Then I read about this. Now, when I can't sleep,
translation.zh: 然后我读到了这个 现在 当我睡不着时

translation.en: -I get up and tap! -Cool.
translation.zh: -我就起来跳踢踏舞！ -酷

translation.en: -You know you're terrible. -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: -你知道你跳得很烂吧 -我知道

translation.en: Six, seven and shuffle!
translation.zh: 六 七 曳步！

translation.en: -Where are you going? -Nowhere.
translation.zh: -你去哪？ -不去哪

translation.en: -Do not get your phone. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -别拿电话 -你说什么？

translation.en: -Do not film this. -I'm checking on Paul Anka.
translation.zh: -不要拍这个 -我去看看保罗安加

translation.en: -Dance numbers terrify him. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 舞步吓到它了

translation.en: This is my stress relief. Do not make my stress relief stressful!
translation.zh: 这是我的压力释放法 不要让我的压力释放法带来压力！

translation.en: -Damn it. Where is it? -I hid it.
translation.zh: -该死 它去哪儿了？ -我藏起来了

translation.en: [gasps] You are awful.
translation.zh: -该死 它去哪儿了？ -我藏起来了 你真可怕

translation.en: You think I don't know you? I have your eyes.
translation.zh: 你以为我不了解你？ 我的眼睛和你一样

translation.en: -Fine. -You want some coffee?
translation.zh: -好 -喝咖啡吗？

translation.en: -Yes, please. -[sighs] You sure I didn't wake you up?
translation.zh: -拜托 -你确认我没有吵醒你？

translation.en: Not unless you were dressed like a urinal cake.
translation.zh: 除非你穿得像是便池蛋糕

translation.en: [sighs] You hungry?
translation.zh: 你饿吗？

translation.en: -'Cause you said "cake"? -[chuckles] Yes.
translation.zh: -因为你说“蛋糕”？ -是

translation.en: Kind of.
translation.zh: 有点儿

translation.en: -It's so nice to have you home. -I wish you were sleeping.
translation.zh: -你回家了真好 -我希望你已经睡了

translation.en: -I wish you were sleeping. -Well, I have a lot on my mind.
translation.zh: -我希望你已经睡了 -我脑子的事太多

translation.en: -My piece for the Atlantic fell through. -No! When?
translation.zh: -我在《大西洋月刊》上文章没通过 -不！什么时候？

translation.en: -Today. That was the call that I got. -Why?
translation.zh: -今天 就是我接的那个电话 -为什么？

translation.en: They just bumped it for other stuff. It happens.
translation.zh: 他们用其他的文章替换了 这样的事常有

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 真遗憾

translation.en: It's okay. I have a lot of irons in the fire.
translation.zh: 没事的 我同时有好几手准备

translation.en: I'm still getting a lot of good responses from the New Yorker piece so...
translation.zh: 《纽约客》上那篇文章还有好评出现

translation.en: Did I tell you that I attacked Gail Collins?
translation.zh: 我跟你说过我袭击了盖尔柯林斯吗？

translation.en: -You did not. -I was in the lobby of the Times Building,
translation.zh: 没有 我在《纽约时报》大厅等着

translation.en: hoping to talk to the metro editor. Suddenly, Gail Collins walks in.
translation.zh: 希望可以和大都会编辑谈谈 突然盖尔柯林斯走了进来

translation.en: I had met her once at the 92nd Street Y.
translation.zh: 我以前在92街犹太人青年会 见过她一次

translation.en: I wasn't expecting to see her and I was jacked up on coffee
translation.zh: 我没想到会见到她 我就扔掉手里的咖啡

translation.en: and I just lunged at her,
translation.zh: 去拥抱她

translation.en: which she interpreted as a stranger lunging at her.
translation.zh: 她以为是不认识的人突然拥抱她

translation.en: -So sensitive. -I felt so stupid.
translation.zh: -太敏感了 -我觉得很傻

translation.en: She was freaking out. She gave me her wallet.
translation.zh: 她很害怕 把她的钱包给了我

translation.en: -[chuckles] Did you keep it? -No.
translation.zh: -你收下了？ -没有

translation.en: But, I don't know, she was really nice about it.
translation.zh: 但她真的很不错

translation.en: She realized who I was and asked the security guards to get off me.
translation.zh: 她想起了我是谁 让保安松开了我

translation.en: Well, here's the upside. You definitely made an impression.
translation.zh: 好的一面就是 你绝对给她留下了印象

translation.en: It's okay. I have a lot of irons in the fire.
translation.zh: 没事的 我同时有很多手准备

translation.en: I heard. You should become a blacksmith.
translation.zh: 我知道了 你该去表演千手观音的

translation.en: [chuckles] What about you?
translation.zh: -你呢？ -我？

translation.en: -Mmm... what about me? -Are you having the dreams again?
translation.zh: -你呢？ -我？ 你又做梦了？

translation.en: I'm just stressed out and kind of feeling my mortality lately.
translation.zh: 我只是最近压力很大 感觉到了自己的死亡

translation.en: -What do you mean? -The other day, a guest left a brochure
translation.zh: 你什么意思？ 一个退房的客人 在房间里留下了一份广告

translation.en: in their room after they checked out.
translation.zh: 一个退房的客人 在房间里留下了一份广告

translation.en: It was for Anthem of the Seas. So I'm flipping through,
translation.zh: 是关于“海洋圣歌号”的 于是我翻了一下

translation.en: looking at swimming pools and pictures of the buffet.
translation.zh: 看看游泳池和自助餐的照片

translation.en: Everything's planned and they have Wi-Fi and Rock of Ages
translation.zh: 一切都井井有条 还有无线网络和《时代摇滚》

translation.en: and you don't have to bring money. I found myself thinking...
translation.zh: 不用带钱 我发现自己在想…

translation.en: -No. -maybe it would be nice to take a cruise!
translation.zh: -不 -…或许坐坐游轮很不错！

translation.en: -No! -And then I broke a hip.
translation.zh: -不！ -然后我就开始忧郁

translation.en: -You are not going on a cruise. -I know.
translation.zh: -你不能去做游轮 -我知道

translation.en: -Is everything okay with Luke? -Yeah, everything's fine.
translation.zh: -卢克一切都好吗？ -一切都好

translation.en: I annoy him and he builds cabinets. Or that's what I think.
translation.zh: 我惹恼了他 他在做橱柜 至少我认为那是橱柜

translation.en: He says we need the storage.
translation.zh: 他说我们需要收纳

translation.en: Do you think it's because of Grandpa?
translation.zh: 你觉得是因为外公？

translation.en: My sudden need to cruise?
translation.zh: 我突然想坐游轮？

translation.en: -Yeah. -No.
translation.zh: -对 -不是的

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我不知道 或许吧

translation.en: I miss him.
translation.zh: 我想他

translation.en: To absent friends.
translation.zh: 敬不在的朋友们

translation.en: To absent friends.
translation.zh: 敬不在的朋友们

translation.en: People might say drinking coffee in the middle of the night
translation.zh: 有人也许会说半夜喝咖啡

translation.en: could hinder your sleep.
translation.zh: 会阻碍睡眠

translation.en: People are dumb.
translation.zh: 人们真愚蠢

translation.en: Caesar, let's go! Where's my toast?
translation.zh: 凯撒 来吧！我的吐司呢？

translation.en: -Toaster's down. -What?
translation.zh: -烤箱坏了 -什么？

translation.en: Oh, wait, it's just unplugged. Toast coming right up.
translation.zh: 刚拔掉电源 吐司马上好

translation.en: Over easy, scrambled soft, whites with cheese. Coffee?
translation.zh: 半熟蛋 炒嫩一些 白色奶酪 再来点咖啡？

translation.en: What's the Wi-Fi password?
translation.zh: 无线网密码多少？

translation.en: -Dinerluke. Capital "D," small "L." -[Caesar] Pick up!
translation.zh: -Dinerluke 只有D大写 -明白！

translation.en: Luke, I need to talk to you about your septic tank testimonial.
translation.zh: 卢克 我得跟你说说你的化粪池证明

translation.en: I'm not giving you a septic tank testimonial, Taylor.
translation.zh: 我不会给你化粪池证明 泰勒

translation.en: If you're confused by what I need,
translation.zh: 如果你不明白我想干什么

translation.en: I brought some sample testimonials to guide you.
translation.zh: 我给你带来了一些证明样本做指导

translation.en: I think you'll find Mimsy Frupp's description
translation.zh: 我想你会发现米姆西福拉普对于

translation.en: of her granddaughter's disastrous day
translation.zh: 她孙女跳进落叶堆那灾难性的一天

translation.en: jumping into fall leaves especially edifying.
translation.zh: 所做的描述非常具有教育意义

translation.en: She thought the tyke was diving into an autumnal paradise.
translation.zh: 她以为那个熊孩子 是跳进秋日的天堂里

translation.en: Instead she found herself submerged--
translation.zh: 结果却发现自己跳进了…

translation.en: -Taylor, order something or get out. -[sighs] Fine.
translation.zh: -泰勒 要么点餐 要么出去 -很好

translation.en: New menu. I'll need a minute.
translation.zh: 新菜单 等我一下

translation.en: -[grunts] -Excuse me. Password?
translation.zh: 抱歉 密码？

translation.en: -DINERDANES321. All caps. -[door opens]
translation.zh: DINERDANES321 全大写

translation.en: -Hey, there she is! Get in here! -[Lorelai] What about me?
translation.zh: -嘿 她来了！进来！ -我呢？

translation.en: Ah, you get in here, too.
translation.zh: 你也进来

translation.en: -Should I be nervous? -[Lorelai] As a rule, yes.
translation.zh: -我应该紧张吗？ -按规则来说 是的

translation.en: Okay. Something I want you to see.
translation.zh: 我有东西给你看

translation.en: New menus.
translation.zh: 新菜单

translation.en: Very nice.
translation.zh: 真好看

translation.en: -Notice anything? -Oh... nope.
translation.zh: -注意到了吗？ -没有

translation.en: Turn it over.
translation.zh: 翻过来

translation.en: -That's my New Yorker piece. Wow! -Super-proud!
translation.zh: -这是我在《纽约客》的文章 哇！ -超级自豪！

translation.en: For everyone to read.
translation.zh: 给大家看的

translation.en: -Now what can I get you? -Coffee, please.
translation.zh: -你们要点什么？ -咖啡

translation.en: -I have a list and I need it all to go. -You got it.
translation.zh: -我有个单子 打包带走 -没问题

translation.en: That's my piece. [in Southern accent] Wrapped in plastic.
translation.zh: 这是我的文章 用塑封封着

translation.en: You knew when Luke moved in with me he'd turn weird.
translation.zh: 你知道卢克和我搬到一起之后 他变得很奇怪

translation.en: Thanks for your patronage! Be sure to call my mom and rate me!
translation.zh: 谢谢你的支持！ 一定要给我妈妈打电话 给我评级！

translation.en: Five stars is appreciated!
translation.zh: 给我五星就太感谢了！

translation.en: First official fare!
translation.zh: 第一笔正式生意！

translation.en: That elderly woman that I successfully drove here?
translation.zh: 那个我刚刚成功送到这里的老太太？

translation.en: That is widow Joy Puddleston from 88 Peach Tree Drive.
translation.zh: 那是桃树街88号的 乔伊帕德斯顿寡妇

translation.en: Right now, thanks to my new business,
translation.zh: 现在 多亏了我的新生意

translation.en: Widow Puddleston is only ten minutes late for chemo!
translation.zh: 帕德斯顿寡妇去做化疗 只晚了十分钟！

translation.en: Are you ordering?
translation.zh: 你点餐吗？

translation.en: Fudgy banana milkshake. I am flying, man!
translation.zh: 巧克力香蕉奶昔 我要赶时间 哥们！

translation.en: -This is gonna work. -Terrific.
translation.zh: -可以的 -太好了

translation.en: -This area over here would be perfect. -Perfect for what, Kirk?
translation.zh: -这个地方很不错 -干什么很不错？

translation.en: Have you heard about my new business, Luke? Ööö-ber?
translation.zh: 你听说过我的新生意 欧步吗？

translation.en: [Lorelai] Do not make that sound!
translation.zh: 别发那音！

translation.en: I need to find a place where, after people call, they can get picked up.
translation.zh: 人们叫车后 我得找个地方接人

translation.en: -This corner would work. -That's not how Uber works.
translation.zh: -这个角落就不错 -优步可不是这样的

translation.en: Well, this isn't Uber, this is...
translation.zh: 这不是优步 这是…

translation.en: -[diners laughing] -Luke, you need to control your woman.
translation.zh: 卢克 管管你的女人

translation.en: Those aren't even your bagels!
translation.zh: 这根本不是你的百吉饼！

translation.en: I'm buying them new ones.
translation.zh: 我给他们买新的

translation.en: Oh, crap! I forgot about Paul?
translation.zh: 该死！我把保罗忘了？

translation.en: You're kidding! He was at the house this whole time?
translation.zh: -开玩笑吧！ -没！ 他一直在家里？

translation.en: -Didn't you notice his car out front? -No, didn't you?
translation.zh: -你没看到他的车在前面？ -没有 你看到了吗？

translation.en: [panting] There you are. Hi, Paul. I'm so sorry, I just--
translation.zh: -你们在这里！ -嗨 保罗 对不起 我…

translation.en: It was my fault. I needed her to come look at something with me.
translation.zh: 是我的错 我需要她来帮我看样东西

translation.en: I forgot to leave you a note. And it's--
translation.zh: 我忘了给你留张条了 这个…

translation.en: -I was about to call you. Are you hungry? -Not really.
translation.zh: -我正要给你打电话 你饿了吗？ -还没

translation.en: -Not really? -I'm not a breakfast person.
translation.zh: -真的还没？ -我不怎么吃早餐

translation.en: As in, you already had breakfast?
translation.zh: 你已经吃过早餐了？

translation.en: -No. -Did you know about this?
translation.zh: -没有 -你知道这个吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna wash my hands. Order me a tea?
translation.zh: 我要去洗洗手 叫杯茶？

translation.en: -Tea? No. -Yes.
translation.zh: -茶？不 -是的

translation.en: -Go on. -Okay.
translation.zh: -去吧 -好

translation.en: -You have got to cut that poor boy loose. -I keep meaning to and I keep...
translation.zh: 你得放开这个可怜的男孩子 我知道 我一直想要这么做

translation.en: -[both] Forgetting! -So, so sad!
translation.zh: -忘记了！ -太悲惨了！

translation.en: Your breakfast list, coffee to go. Have a good flight. Come back soon.
translation.zh: 你的早餐单子 咖啡外带 飞行愉快 早点回来

translation.en: -And take a menu. -[chuckles] Thanks, Luke.
translation.zh: -拿份菜单 -谢谢 卢克

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: Crap, crap, crap! Ooh!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: -Hey, got the food. -Ready to go?
translation.zh: -嘿 吃的拿到了 -走吗？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: [Michel] I just don't understand it.
translation.zh: （蜻蜓旅馆） 我就是不明白

translation.en: Before we got married,
translation.zh: 在我们结婚前

translation.en: Frederick was more indifferent to children than I am.
translation.zh: 弗雷德里克对孩子比我更漠不关心

translation.en: -That's not possible. -Oh, yes.
translation.zh: -不可能 -是的

translation.en: We could be walking by the well that Timmy fell down and he'd throw a penny in.
translation.zh: 我们走过提米掉下去的那口井 他会往里面扔一分钱

translation.en: -Maybe he kept his feelings to himself. -For five years? No.
translation.zh: -或许他的感情内敛 -内敛了五年？不

translation.en: Something happened.
translation.zh: 后来出事了

translation.en: Twenty minutes after "I do," he lost his mind.
translation.zh: 在说过“我愿意”之后二十分钟 他疯了

translation.en: Now all he talks about is, "Guess who's pregnant?"
translation.zh: 现在他一直在说 “猜猜谁怀孕了？”

translation.en: or "What school district is it in?
translation.zh: 或是“这是在哪个学区？

translation.en: You have to live in a good school district."
translation.zh: 一定要住在好学区”

translation.en: And I say, "Why? Isn't that what boarding school is for?
translation.zh: 我说：“为什么？ 寄宿学校不就是干这个的吗？

translation.en: So you don't have to live in a good school district?"
translation.zh: 就可以不必住在好学区？”

translation.en: I don't think that's what boarding school's for.
translation.zh: 我觉得寄宿学校不是起这个作用的

translation.en: Well, it's very mystifying.
translation.zh: 真是太神秘了

translation.en: He keeps shoving children in my arms.
translation.zh: 他一直把孩子往我怀里推

translation.en: "Hold this. What do you feel?"
translation.zh: “抱着 你感觉如何？”

translation.en: "Well, now there's spittle on my Brioni suit so, rage?"
translation.zh: “现在我的布里奥尼外套上 有口水 生气吗？”

translation.en: -Why does it smell like onions? -The new pop-up crew in the kitchen.
translation.zh: -为什么有洋葱的味道？ -厨房里有临时新员工

translation.en: -[sighs] That's tonight? -Yes, that's tonight.
translation.zh: -是今晚？ -对 是今晚

translation.en: -I hate this pop-up idea. -We have an empty dining room and kitchen.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢临时员工这个办法 我们的餐厅和厨房都空了

translation.en: -What do you propose we do? -Put on a show?
translation.zh: -你觉得该怎么办呢？ -搞个演出？

translation.en: We live in a town where every restaurant closes at 4:45.
translation.zh: 我们这个小镇上 4点45分所有的餐厅就关门了

translation.en: People need to eat.
translation.zh: 人们得吃饭啊

translation.en: -What's this new chef guy's name again? -Oh, come on.
translation.zh: -这个新大厨叫什么来着？ -拜托

translation.en: I can't remember. It's like a million syllables long.
translation.zh: 我记不住 感觉有几万个音节那么长

translation.en: Roy Choi.
translation.zh: 罗伊崔

translation.en: -The food truck guy. -He's not a food truck guy.
translation.zh: -做餐车的那个人 -他不是做餐车的那个

translation.en: He's a guy with a food truck.
translation.zh: 是 他就是做餐车的

translation.en: A fleet of food trucks, three restaurants and a massive online following.
translation.zh: 一个餐车队 三家餐厅 以及一个庞大的网上支持

translation.en: Oh, so he tweets? He's a tweeter?
translation.zh: 他用推特吗？

translation.en: "Hey, kids. Come grab some rad food at the Dragonfly."
translation.zh: “嘿 孩子们 来蜻蜓旅馆买些吃的”

translation.en: Do you even know how Twitter works?
translation.zh: 你知道怎么用推特吗？

translation.en: -Oh, he's cool, right? -Yes, he seems cool.
translation.zh: -他很酷 对吗？ -对 他看起来很酷

translation.en: I hate cool. Makes me feel so uncool.
translation.zh: 我讨厌酷 让我觉得自己很不酷

translation.en: I don't need some cool guy tweeting, making me feel uncool in my own inn.
translation.zh: 我不需要有很酷的人发推特 让我觉得在自己的旅馆里很不酷

translation.en: Why on earth aren't you on Xanax? It was invented for you.
translation.zh: 你究竟为什么不吃赞安诺？ 它就是给你发明的

translation.en: What's that "Kogi" tattoo on his arm about?
translation.zh: 那个“科吉”的纹身是怎么回事？

translation.en: Kogi is the name of his business.
translation.zh: 科吉是他公司的名字

translation.en: So the tattoo, while not as clever as "Wino Forever,"
translation.zh: 所以那个纹身 或许没有“永恒的酒鬼”聪明

translation.en: is at least thematically correct.
translation.zh: 但至少理论上是对的

translation.en: -We should hire a regular chef. -We should, shouldn't we?
translation.zh: -我们应该请个固定大厨 -的确是 不是吗？

translation.en: -How long is this pop-up thing? -Two weeks.
translation.zh: -这个临时团队待多久？ -两个星期

translation.en: -Can it be less? -No.
translation.zh: -短点吧？ -不行

translation.en: -I'd like it to be less. -I don't need a child. I have you.
translation.zh: -我希望再缩短些 -我不需要孩子 我有你

translation.en: Great. He's gonna set the whole place on fire.
translation.zh: 太好了 他会把所有地方都点着

translation.en: -[Roy] Oh, hey, Lorelai. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 罗蕾莱 -嘿

translation.en: This kitchen's awesome. Sookie set it up perfectly.
translation.zh: 厨房太棒了 -苏琪打理得很好 -苏琪是个天才

translation.en: Yes, well, Sookie's a genius.
translation.zh: -苏琪打理得很好 -苏琪是个天才

translation.en: -What is all this? -You like abalone?
translation.zh: -这都是什么？ -你喜欢鲍鱼？

translation.en: -Is this a trick question? -No. Abalone is delicious.
translation.zh: -这个问题是在给我下套吗？ -鲍鱼很美味

translation.en: I'm doing a green pea congee with fried shallots, spring onions,
translation.zh: 我在做豌豆粥 配炸洋葱 小葱

translation.en: cilantro, chili oil and abalone. Oh, I meant to ask.
translation.zh: 香菜叶 辣椒油和鲍鱼 我本来想问一下的

translation.en: Can I screw with the dining room? Make it less granny?
translation.zh: 我可以改动一下餐厅吗？ 不那么老气？

translation.en: -Uh, no. -Problem. No problem.
translation.zh: -不可以 -没问题

translation.en: [Michel chuckles] De-granny the place.
translation.zh: 让这地方不那么老气

translation.en: Go nuts. I hated my grandmother. Horrible woman.
translation.zh: 疯掉了 我讨厌我奶奶 可怕的女人

translation.en: But we are thrilled that you are here. And she's not. [laughs]
translation.zh: 但我们很高兴你在这里 而她不在

translation.en: All right, come on, you guys. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好吧 来吧各位 走吧

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Abalone! Yay! [laughs]
translation.zh: 鲍鱼！耶！

translation.en: Will you relax, please?
translation.zh: 你能放松点儿吗？

translation.en: Between you and Frederick, I'm going to have a stroke.
translation.zh: 夹在你和弗雷德里克之间 我会中风的

translation.en: -Where is it? -What?
translation.zh: -那东西在哪里？ -什么东西？

translation.en: The coffeemaker. Where is the coffeemaker?
translation.zh: 咖啡机在哪里？

translation.en: -Uh... -It was right here yesterday!
translation.zh: 昨天就在这里的！

translation.en: -It was right here! Roy! -Uh, I... Wait... [sighs]
translation.zh: -就在这里来着！罗伊！ -等等…

translation.en: Roy! Um, Roy? [chuckles] Where's the coffee machine?
translation.zh: 罗伊！罗伊？ 咖啡机去哪儿了？

translation.en: I moved it. I needed counter space. Eduardo can make you a coffee.
translation.zh: 我挪走了 我需要流理台面 爱德华多可以给你做咖啡

translation.en: -How? Is Eduardo magic? -He makes a stovetop version--
translation.zh: -怎么做？他会魔术？ -他弄了个炉面款的…

translation.en: -Eh, eh. -It really is-- -Eh, eh, eh, eh. -I can move it back.
translation.zh: 这真的是…我可以挪回来

translation.en: I am so sorry, but this isn't gonna to work.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 但这样不行

translation.en: -Michel! -I'm right here.
translation.zh: -米歇尔！ -这儿呢

translation.en: Oh, sorry. Uh, Michel, call over to Momo's and see if they can accommodate
translation.zh: 对不起 米歇尔 给莫莫店打电话

translation.en: a crazy cool congee extravaganza.
translation.zh: 看他们能否接收 一个非常酷的豆粥自大狂

translation.en: Thank you. It's been a pleasure.
translation.zh: 谢谢 万分荣幸

translation.en: Louis here is gonna walk you over to Momo's Tires and get you settled.
translation.zh: 这位路易斯会陪你到莫莫轮胎店 帮你安顿下来

translation.en: -Wait, it's a tire store? -[chuckles] Buh-bye. Thank you.
translation.zh: -等会儿 是个轮胎店？ -再见 谢谢

translation.en: What, Michel?
translation.zh: 什么 米歇尔？

translation.en: At least you were nicer than you were to Anthony Bourdain.
translation.zh: 至少你对他比对安东尼波登好多了

translation.en: Bourdain parked in Sookie's spot.
translation.zh: 波登被放在苏琪家了

translation.en: Now once again, we have an empty kitchen.
translation.zh: 现在我们的厨房又空了

translation.en: We will find a full-time chef.
translation.zh: 我们要找全职大厨

translation.en: -No, we won't. -Yes, we will.
translation.zh: -不行 -要找

translation.en: You think no one can cook like her.
translation.zh: 你觉得没人跟她做得一样好

translation.en: -No one can. -April Bloomfield?
translation.zh: -没有人 -艾普尔布洛姆菲尔德？

translation.en: -Too much pork. -Alice Waters.
translation.zh: -猪肉太多了 -爱丽丝华特斯

translation.en: -Little flighty. -[scoffs] David Chang?
translation.zh: -有点儿轻浮 -戴维张？

translation.en: Al's does the same thing.
translation.zh: 艾尔也能做一样的

translation.en: Al's Pancake World does not do the same thing as David Chang.
translation.zh: 艾尔的煎饼世界和戴维张做的不一样

translation.en: -It has to be right. -You miss her? Fine. I don't.
translation.zh: 没办法 对的才行 你想她？很好 我不想 她抛弃了我们

translation.en: -She abandoned us. -She did not abandon us.
translation.zh: 你想她？很好 我不想 她抛弃了我们 -她没有抛弃我们 -六个月的休假

translation.en: A six month sabbatical. That's what she said.
translation.zh: -她没有抛弃我们 -六个月的休假 她是这么说的 她要去整理思路

translation.en: She was going to clear her head,
translation.zh: 她是这么说的 她要去整理思路

translation.en: come up with new recipes and then be back.
translation.zh: 想出新的菜单然后回来

translation.en: -Well, that was a year ago. -What can I say? She found a calling.
translation.zh: 那是一年前的事了 能说什么呢？她找到了一种召唤

translation.en: -Really. What's her calling? -Michel.
translation.zh: -真的？什么召唤？ -米歇尔

translation.en: I'm curious. Describe what she's doing up in the woods?
translation.zh: 我很好奇 描述一下她在树林里做的事？

translation.en: She's working with Dan Barber at Blue Hill Farm.
translation.zh: 她和丹巴伯尔在蓝山农场工作

translation.en: Doing?
translation.zh: 做什么？

translation.en: She is helping him develop food-growing techniques
translation.zh: 她帮他发展食物生长科技

translation.en: and cultivating the evolution of fruits and vegetables,
translation.zh: 培育改良水果和蔬菜

translation.en: which helps the people who eat them and--
translation.zh: 从而帮助吃这些东西的人们 并且…

translation.en: I don't know. They're saving the world. It's on the website.
translation.zh: 我不知道 他们在拯救世界 网站上这么说的

translation.en: No, she's squatting in a cabin with no phone service,
translation.zh: 不 她住在一个没有电话的小屋里

translation.en: trying to grow a pineapple out of a coat rack!
translation.zh: 试图从衣帽架里种出菠萝来！

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrating] -She's not saving the world.
translation.zh: 她没有拯救世界

translation.en: She just found a way to never shave her legs again.
translation.zh: 她只是找到一个办法 可以永远不必再刮腿毛了

translation.en: Ooh! Hi, Gypsy!
translation.zh: 嗨 吉普塞！

translation.en: -I have good news. -Great! What?
translation.zh: -我有好消息 -太好了 什么？

translation.en: Oh, Lorelai. Damn, I dialed the wrong number.
translation.zh: （休斯兄弟汽油） 罗蕾莱 该死 我拨错电话了

translation.en: -I'll call you back. -Wait! When can I get my car?
translation.zh: -我回头打给你 -不 等等！我什么时候能拿回车？

translation.en: I'm waiting for a part. It's coming in a DeLorean from 1983.
translation.zh: 我在等个配件 是1983款德罗宁跑车上的配件

translation.en: -I have to go to Hartford tonight. -I don't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: -我今晚要去哈特福特 -我不知道该说什么

translation.en: Oh, wait, yes I do. Buy a new car.
translation.zh: 等等 我知道了 买辆新车吧

translation.en: -Thanks. Great. -I hate this one.
translation.zh: -谢谢 真是不错 -我讨厌这辆

translation.en: -It's very old. -I got it.
translation.zh: -太旧了 -我知道了

translation.en: -But it's fun to kick. -Bye, Gypsy.
translation.zh: -但踢着玩很有趣 -再见 吉普塞

translation.en: Hi, Mrs. Gleason?
translation.zh: 嗨 格利森太太？

translation.en: Hey, Kirk? It's freezing back here.
translation.zh: 嘿 柯克？后排这里好冷

translation.en: Oh, that's probably because I vented the floor.
translation.zh: 或许是因为我给地板通了风

translation.en: -Pardon? -The floor.
translation.zh: -什么？ -地板

translation.en: I drilled a few holes in the floor.
translation.zh: 我在地板上钻了几个洞

translation.en: Was there an explanation with that or...
translation.zh: 是否可以解释一下…

translation.en: Two customers passed out last week.
translation.zh: 上周有两个客人去世了

translation.en: They were old, so it could've just been old people passing out.
translation.zh: 或许只是因上了年纪离世

translation.en: Or carbon monoxide. I just thought better safe than sorry.
translation.zh: 或是一氧化碳中毒 我想最好防患于未然

translation.en: -Would you like some water? -Yes. That would be nice.
translation.zh: -你要喝水吗？ -好 太好了

translation.en: Here, could you...
translation.zh: 给你 你能不能…

translation.en: -Oh, uh, okay. -And how about some music?
translation.zh: 好 来点儿音乐怎么样？

translation.en: The radio was stolen, but I'm happy to sing any song you request...
translation.zh: 收音机被偷走了 但我很乐意让你点歌我来唱…

translation.en: as long as it's by the Carpenters.
translation.zh: 只要是卡朋特乐队的歌

translation.en: -How about something by the Carpenters? -Good choice.
translation.zh: -唱点卡朋特乐队的歌吧？ -选得好

translation.en: ♪ Such a feeling's coming over me ♪
translation.zh: 一种柔情缠绕着我

translation.en: ♪ There is wonder In most everything I see ♪
translation.zh: 我看到的一切都如此奇妙

translation.en: ♪ Not a cloud in the sky ♪
translation.zh: 天空中的云

translation.en: ♪ Now the sun is in my eye ♪
translation.zh: 我眼中充满阳光

translation.en: ♪ And I won't be surprised If it's a dream ♪
translation.zh: 若这是梦 我也不会惊讶

translation.en: [Lorelai] Uh, well, thanks, Kirk.
translation.zh: 谢谢 柯克

translation.en: [Kirk] I'm not there yet.
translation.zh: 我还没到呢

translation.en: -You know, I think I'm okay. -It's door-to-door service.
translation.zh: -我想可以了 -这是门对门的服务

translation.en: -Well, I won't tell if you don't. -I still have to charge the same price.
translation.zh: 没关系 你不提我是不会说的 我还是要收全价

translation.en: -That's fine, Kirk. -[engine rattles and stalls]
translation.zh: 没关系的 柯克

translation.en: -[Kirk] You have arrived! -Bye, Kirk.
translation.zh: -你到了！ -再见 柯克

translation.en: [Berta] Oh, hola! Hello.
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: Hi. Um, uh, I'm Lorelai.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是罗蕾莱

translation.en: Emily's, um...
translation.zh: 艾米丽的…

translation.en: No, no, no. I don't think Rory's here yet.
translation.zh: 不 我想萝莉还没来

translation.en: Um, my, uh, daughter, that's... That's her.
translation.zh: 我的女儿 那…是她

translation.en: She's not and I'm not gonna be flying solo tonight,
translation.zh: 她没来 我不想一个人进去

translation.en: -so I'm gonna wait outside. -Oh!
translation.zh: 我在外面等着

translation.en: But don't say anything to, uh, Mrs. Gilmore.
translation.zh: 但是什么都别对吉尔摩太太说

translation.en: -Oh. [chuckles] -Okay? Shh. Shh.
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. [chuckles] -Okay. Thank you.
translation.zh: -好的 -好 谢谢

translation.en: [Lorelai] Oh, thank God!
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: Hey, you promised you'd be here right at 7:00.
translation.zh: 嘿 你答应过你会七点准时到

translation.en: -It's 7:05. -Apology accepted.
translation.zh: -现在七点零五 -接受你的道歉

translation.en: -Why are you out here? It's freezing. -'Cause we're a team.
translation.zh: -你在这里干什么？外面很冷 -我们是一个团队

translation.en: Would Dean Martin go in without Jerry Lewis?
translation.zh: 迪恩马丁会丢下杰里刘易斯 自己进去？

translation.en: No, but Jerry Lewis would go in without Dean.
translation.zh: 不会 但杰里刘易斯会丢下迪恩

translation.en: Am I Jerry Lewis?
translation.zh: 我是杰里刘易斯？

translation.en: -I'm ringing the doorbell. -Why am I Jerry Lewis?
translation.zh: -我按门铃 -为什么我是杰里刘易斯？

translation.en: I don't need to answer that.
translation.zh: 这个问题我现在不需要回答

translation.en: Hmm. Hi, here's Rory. Ah! [speaking her language]
translation.zh: 嗨 萝莉来了

translation.en: [Lorelai] Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Rory, there you are. It is so good to see you.
translation.zh: 萝莉 你来了 见到你真好

translation.en: Hi, Grandma. It's so good to see you. How are you?
translation.zh: 嗨 外婆 见到你真好 你好吗？

translation.en: Well, I am a Gilmore.
translation.zh: 我是吉尔摩家的人

translation.en: -[chuckles] -My goodness, you look absolutely radiant.
translation.zh: 天啊 你真是容光焕发

translation.en: Well, she is a Gilmore. And 32, which helps.
translation.zh: 她是吉尔摩家的人 32岁 如果有帮助的话

translation.en: -I think you must be in love. -Hi, Mom.
translation.zh: -我想你一定是恋爱了 -嗨 妈妈

translation.en: [sighs] Don't track mud in here. I had the floors waxed.
translation.zh: 别把泥水带进来 我给地板打蜡了

translation.en: You and I had a better rapport.
translation.zh: -咱俩的交流更和谐 -抱歉 吉尔摩太太

translation.en: Oh, good, good. In here. I need light bulbs.
translation.zh: 很好 进来 我需要灯泡

translation.en: This, there. You see...
translation.zh: 这里 你看…

translation.en: -There and there. -[man] Ah.
translation.zh: 那里和那里

translation.en: -The bulbs... the bulbs are out. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 灯泡坏了

translation.en: -No problem. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -没问题 -是吗？

translation.en: And now... And in here...
translation.zh: 现在…这里…

translation.en: that sconce...
translation.zh: 那个烛台

translation.en: and then over the picture, the light. Over here, the picture...
translation.zh: 还有画上面 那个灯 然后这儿 那幅画…

translation.en: The... the lights over the picture? Yes?
translation.zh: 画上面的灯？是吗？

translation.en: Did you get a new handyman, Mom?
translation.zh: 你找了个新的帮工 妈妈？

translation.en: -Cyrano? -Grandma, did you hire a new handyman?
translation.zh: -帮我传话？ -外婆 你请了个新帮工？

translation.en: Yes. That's Alejandro.
translation.zh: 对 他是亚历杭德罗

translation.en: He's Berta's husband and he's amazing. He can fix anything.
translation.zh: 是伯塔的丈夫 他很棒 什么东西都能修好

translation.en: I'm usually wary about hiring husbands.
translation.zh: 我雇用她们的丈夫时总是很谨慎

translation.en: I hired a maid once whose husband was a gardener.
translation.zh: 我曾雇用过一个女仆的丈夫 是个园丁

translation.en: He got angry with her one day and decapitated one of my topiaries.
translation.zh: 有天他跟她生气了 砍掉了我的灌木丛

translation.en: -Hmm. Was it the one of Spiro Agnew? -[children laughing]
translation.zh: 那是斯皮罗阿格纽的吗？

translation.en: -Ask her, ask her. -Uh, Grandma...
translation.zh: -问她 -外婆…

translation.en: just wondering... Who are the kids?
translation.zh: 我想知道 那些孩子是谁？

translation.en: -Oh, they're Berta's children, I think. -You think?
translation.zh: 我想是伯塔的孩子 -你想？ -她一出现 他们就出现

translation.en: They appeared when she did, so I put two and two together.
translation.zh: -你想？ -她一出现 他们就出现 我就这么联系起来了

translation.en: You have an entire family in your house and you're not sure if they're actually a family?
translation.zh: 有一家人住在你家里 你却不确定他们是不是一家人？

translation.en: So what, Lorelai?
translation.zh: 那又如何 罗蕾莱？

translation.en: I have a house. They needed a place to live.
translation.zh: 我有房子 他们需要地方住

translation.en: They work for me. Problem?
translation.zh: 他们为我工作 有问题吗？

translation.en: No. Yes. All good. You're right.
translation.zh: 没有 对 没问题 你说得对

translation.en: Let's go sit and have martinis. You can tell me all about this new boy.
translation.zh: 去坐下喝点马丁尼 你给我讲讲这个新男朋友

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, he's not new. We've been going out about two years.
translation.zh: 他不是新的 我们约会了两年

translation.en: -Really? I must meet him. -Oh, you did.
translation.zh: -真的？我一定要见见他 -你见过了

translation.en: Really? I'm sorry. I'll meet him again.
translation.zh: 真的？对不起 我要再见见他

translation.en: -[Lorelai] Won't matter. -Come sit.
translation.zh: -没关系的 -过来坐下

translation.en: -[gasps] -[stutters] What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -Uh, Mom? -[Emily] Yes?
translation.zh: -妈妈？ -嗯？

translation.en: -Um... -[Emily] Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: Isn't it wonderful?
translation.zh: 不好看吗？

translation.en: It's... [sighs]
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: -It's... it's... -[Lorelai gasping]
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: [stutters] It's...
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: The whole wall!
translation.zh: 整面墙！

translation.en: I had it painted from one of my favorite pictures of him.
translation.zh: 是根据他照片里我最喜欢的一张画的 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: -Do you like it? -Yes. [Rory] Sure.
translation.zh: -是的 -当然了

translation.en: It's so... big.
translation.zh: 太大了

translation.en: It's a Marco Toretti. His specialty is large canvases.
translation.zh: 是马尔科特来蒂画的 他专做大幅画

translation.en: Well, he did himself proud.
translation.zh: 他真是令自己骄傲

translation.en: -And... you wanted it that big, right? -Of course I did.
translation.zh: -你想要这么大的 对吗？ -当然了

translation.en: 'Cause it's a... a real presence.
translation.zh: 因为这简直跟真的一样

translation.en: As was your father. Olive?
translation.zh: 和你父亲一模一样 加橄榄吗？

translation.en: And he came and measured the space?
translation.zh: 他来丈量过墙面？

translation.en: -Who? -Mario Andretti?
translation.zh: -谁？ -马里奥安里蒂？

translation.en: Marco Toretti. Yes, he did. Why?
translation.zh: 是马尔科特来蒂 对 他来过 怎么了？

translation.en: -No reason. -I wanted something dramatic.
translation.zh: -没什么 -我想要夸张点的

translation.en: And you got it.
translation.zh: 你做到了

translation.en: -I did. -[Lorelai] Okay.
translation.zh: -我做到了 -好吧

translation.en: -Cheers. -[Rory] Cheers.
translation.zh: -干杯 -干杯

translation.en: Oh, come on, Mom. Admit it.
translation.zh: 拜托 妈妈 承认吧

translation.en: -Admit what? -You Spinal Tapped the painting.
translation.zh: -承认什么？ -你把画的尺寸搞错了

translation.en: -What? -You Spinal Tapped the painting.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你把画的尺寸搞错了

translation.en: You gave them the wrong dimensions and now you are trying to pretend
translation.zh: 你给了他们错误的尺寸 现在你假装

translation.en: that massive portrait is something you intended.
translation.zh: 这幅大画是你本来就想要的

translation.en: -It was. Yes. -It was?
translation.zh: -的确是 -的确是？

translation.en: You intended for Dad's eyebrow and my forearm to be the same length?
translation.zh: 你希望爸爸的眉毛 -和我的小臂一样长？ -是的

translation.en: -Yes. -It's 18-feet tall!
translation.zh: -和我的小臂一样长？ -是的 这有五米半了！

translation.en: It's not 18-feet tall.
translation.zh: -没有五米半 -看起来像有五米半

translation.en: -It looks 18 feet-tall. -Should I get a tape measure?
translation.zh: -没有五米半 -看起来像有五米半 我拿个卷尺？

translation.en: -No. -I can get a tape measure.
translation.zh: -不 -我可以拿个卷尺

translation.en: -Do not get a tape measure. -Alejandro has one.
translation.zh: -不要拿卷尺 -亚历杭德罗有一个

translation.en: I don't believe you wanted a portrait of Dad so massive,
translation.zh: 我不相信 你想要这么大一幅爸爸的画像

translation.en: -it doesn't fit on the wall! -Well, I did.
translation.zh: -和这面墙根本不合适！ -我就是想要

translation.en: A portrait so big, Peter Jackson could hang it at the Argonath.
translation.zh: 这么大的一幅画 彼得杰克逊 可以把它挂在阿苟纳斯巨像那里

translation.en: -Yes, he could. -You don't know what the Argonath is!
translation.zh: -他可以 -你不知道阿苟纳斯巨像是什么！

translation.en: Doesn't matter. It's a nice picture of Grandpa.
translation.zh: 没关系 这是外公一幅很好的画像

translation.en: Mom. Do it over.
translation.zh: 妈妈 换掉它吧

translation.en: Get what you want. You have the money.
translation.zh: 换成你想要的尺寸 你有钱

translation.en: -This is what I want. -I swear it can't be.
translation.zh: -我就想要这个 -我发誓绝对不是的

translation.en: -Why not? -Because! Look at it.
translation.zh: -为什么不？ -因为！你看啊

translation.en: It's nuts! "Wizard, you shall not pass!" Seriously!
translation.zh: 这太疯狂了！ “巫师 此路不通！” 开玩笑吧！

translation.en: Fine! I made a mistake! Are you happy?
translation.zh: 很好！我犯了个错误！你开心了？

translation.en: I gave them the wrong dimensions, and they screwed it up.
translation.zh: 我给了他们错误的尺寸 他们弄错了

translation.en: I'm a screw-up! I admit it!
translation.zh: 我弄错了！我承认！

translation.en: Just please, don't let this be the only thing you remember to say at my funeral!
translation.zh: 拜托 我的葬礼上 不要只记得说这件事！

translation.en: [sighs] So...
translation.zh: 那…

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Did I tell you what happened at the funeral after you left?
translation.zh: 我告诉过你你离开后 葬礼上发生的事吗？

translation.en: Why, no, you didn't.
translation.zh: 怎么了 你没说

translation.en: Because something did.
translation.zh: 因为出了点事

translation.en: So nice of you to come. You're in Florida now, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你能来真好 你们现在住在佛罗里达？

translation.en: We are. You should come visit us when things calm down a bit.
translation.zh: 是的 等事情都安排好后 你该来看看我们

translation.en: I'll do that. I promise.
translation.zh: 我会的 我保证

translation.en: -[man] Beautiful service, Emily. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -做得不错 艾米丽 -谢谢

translation.en: -I'm all right, Rory. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我没事 萝莉 -好

translation.en: -I really am all right. -I know.
translation.zh: -我真的没事 -我知道

translation.en: [Jason] Lorelai.
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱

translation.en: [gasps] Jason Stiles, as I live and breathe.
translation.zh: 詹森斯泰尔斯 我的天啊

translation.en: You look like the hottest Italian widow I have ever seen.
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最热辣的意大利寡妇

translation.en: [chuckles] It's nice that you came.
translation.zh: 你能来真好

translation.en: Your father was a lion. You know that.
translation.zh: 你父亲是头雄狮 你知道的

translation.en: [sighs] I do.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: I'm deeply sorry.
translation.zh: 我很难过

translation.en: At least it was sudden. Mom didn't have to watch him fade away.
translation.zh: 至少是突然的 妈妈不用看着他的生命一点点逝去

translation.en: Have you seen my mother by the way?
translation.zh: 你见过我妈妈了吗？

translation.en: I've been successfully keeping a living room's worth of space between us.
translation.zh: 我成功地让起居室里只有我们两个人

translation.en: She's in hostess mode. At worst, she'll send you home with shrimp.
translation.zh: 她在招呼客人 最坏的情况 她会把虾给你然后送客

translation.en: -To which I'm allergic. -Thus fulfilling her devious plan.
translation.zh: -我对那个过敏 -正好遂了她的意

translation.en: -You happy? -Right now or... [chuckles]
translation.zh: -开心吗？ -是现在还是…

translation.en: Are you happy?
translation.zh: 现在开心吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Umlauts.
translation.zh: 元音符号

translation.en: -Digger. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 挖掘机

translation.en: [Lorelai] What you doin'?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Oh, there was a screw loose in the heating vent.
translation.zh: 暖气通风口有个螺丝松了

translation.en: I didn't want it to fall out.
translation.zh: 我不希望它掉下来

translation.en: Uh-huh. Did you service the boiler yet?
translation.zh: 你检修完锅炉了吗？

translation.en: It was just the one screw. That's it.
translation.zh: 只是一个螺丝 仅此而已

translation.en: Garbage disposal working now?
translation.zh: 垃圾处理能用了？

translation.en: I just saw it like that and I had this with me so...
translation.zh: 我刚看到 正好又拿着这个 所以…

translation.en: -And the rain gutters? -Well...
translation.zh: -雨水槽呢？ -哦…

translation.en: You can't leave them clogged like that. The water gets in the house. [sighs]
translation.zh: 你不能就让它们堵着 雨水会进房间里的

translation.en: I can't help it. Funerals make me nervous.
translation.zh: 我没办法 葬礼让我紧张

translation.en: -Here. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: [Berta in her language] This is such a big house and things go wrong all the time.
translation.zh: 这是一所大房子 总是有东西会坏

translation.en: But I could have my husband fix everything.
translation.zh: 但我可以让我丈夫修理所有东西

translation.en: And we could move in here with you so you would not be so alone
translation.zh: 我们可以搬进来和你住 你就不会觉得孤单

translation.en: and we can take care of everything.
translation.zh: 我们可以照料一切

translation.en: -[in English] Everything. -Sure.
translation.zh: -一切 -当然了

translation.en: [in her language] You will like my husband. He's very tall and quiet.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢我丈夫的 他个子很高 很安静

translation.en: -[in English] Okay? -Sure.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -当然了

translation.en: Oh, Señora Gilmore, don't worry.
translation.zh: 吉尔摩太太 不要担心

translation.en: -Fine. Just take that to the kitchen? -[speaking her language]
translation.zh: 很好 拿到厨房去？

translation.en: -What language is that? -I do not know.
translation.zh: -那是什么语？ -我不知道

translation.en: I thought it was Spanish,
translation.zh: 以为是西班牙语

translation.en: but I had the gardener tell her to come in early one day
translation.zh: 我有一天让园丁告诉她早点来

translation.en: and he told me she wasn't speaking Spanish,
translation.zh: 他告诉我她不会说西班牙语

translation.en: It took me a while to understand
translation.zh: 我想了会儿才明白

translation.en: because I need the pool man to translate for the gardener.
translation.zh: 因为我需要那个修游泳池的人 给园丁翻译

translation.en: -Hey, time to get going, kid. -Oh, shoot!
translation.zh: -嘿 该走了 孩子 -糟糕！

translation.en: I have to get to the airport!
translation.zh: 我得赶去机场！

translation.en: My goodness, so dramatic.
translation.zh: 天啊 太夸张了

translation.en: Please tell your daughter I'm going to be fine.
translation.zh: 请告诉你女儿我会没事的

translation.en: -The two of you can just run along. -Oh, no. I'm gonna have Luke drive her.
translation.zh: 你们可以走了 不 我让卢克送她去

translation.en: -You're staying? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你留下？ -是

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Grandma...
translation.zh: 外婆…

translation.en: You made him very proud.
translation.zh: 你让他很骄傲

translation.en: -I will call you when I get to London. -[Luke sighs]
translation.zh: 我到了伦敦就给你打电话

translation.en: Emily, everything's in good shape here.
translation.zh: 艾米丽 这里一切都好了

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -Just send her your bill.
translation.zh: -什么？ -把你的账单给她

translation.en: Right. So...
translation.zh: 好 那么…

translation.en: Thank you, Luke. Drive safe now.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 卢克 开车小心

translation.en: Okay, love you.
translation.zh: 好 我爱你

translation.en: Ditto. Bye, guys.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 再见各位

translation.en: So... scotch?
translation.zh: 苏格兰威士忌？

translation.en: God, yes.
translation.zh: 天啊 好啊

translation.en: -One of his favorites. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 他最喜欢的一首歌

translation.en: A classic for a classic.
translation.zh: 经典人士听经典曲子

translation.en: Hear, hear.
translation.zh: 同意

translation.en: [sighs] Well, I know it's getting late
translation.zh: 我知道天晚了

translation.en: and I know some of you have a very long ride home.
translation.zh: 我知道你们很多人 开车回家还要很远

translation.en: I want to thank you for your friendship and for being here.
translation.zh: 我想感谢你们的友谊 感谢你们能来这里

translation.en: Richard loved you all very much.
translation.zh: 理查德非常爱你们

translation.en: But before we all go our separate ways,
translation.zh: 但在我们分开之前

translation.en: I thought we could go around and everyone could stand up
translation.zh: 我想我们应该轮流站出来

translation.en: and tell a favorite story about Richard.
translation.zh: 讲一个最喜欢的关于理查德的故事

translation.en: What did she just say?
translation.zh: 她刚才说什么？

translation.en: I know there are hundreds to choose from.
translation.zh: 我知道大家都有很多故事要讲

translation.en: But too bad, I'm going to limit you to just one.
translation.zh: 但是很糟糕 每人只能讲一个

translation.en: The best one.
translation.zh: 最好的一个

translation.en: The one that most sums up the Richard Gilmore you know and love.
translation.zh: 最能概括你认识的 你爱的理查德吉尔摩

translation.en: Let's start here. Jack?
translation.zh: 从这里开始吧 杰克？

translation.en: Well, Richard and I go back, um, to Yale.
translation.zh: 哦 理查德和我在耶鲁时

translation.en: -We both went there... -Excuse me. Please switch places with me.
translation.zh: -我们都是那里的… -抱歉 请和我换个位子

translation.en: -What? -There's a draft.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我这边风有点大

translation.en: -We're outside. -Yeah, don't wanna go next.
translation.zh: -我们是在外面 -对 不想做下一个

translation.en: [Jack] So, I decide to sneak a pair of black lacy women's unmentionables
translation.zh: 我决定把一件黑色的蕾丝女内衣

translation.en: into his locker for everyone to see.
translation.zh: 偷偷放在他更衣柜里 让大家都看到

translation.en: And so, one day after polo practice,
translation.zh: 有一天 马球课后

translation.en: I'm at the locker and I'm trying to pick the lock so that I can leave
translation.zh: 我到了更衣柜 试图打开锁

translation.en: the unmentionables there, and suddenly,
translation.zh: 好把内衣放进去 突然

translation.en: I look up and I see him standing there across the way at my locker
translation.zh: 我抬起头来 看到他站我的衣柜对面

translation.en: also holding a pair of black lacy knickers.
translation.zh: 手里也拿着一件黑色蕾丝内裤

translation.en: -[guests chuckle] -And he sees me and we look at each other holding these women's underpants.
translation.zh: 他看到了我 我们对望着 手里拿着女士内裤

translation.en: So finally, Richard says,
translation.zh: 最后 理查德说

translation.en: "Well, we can't possibly both be in black." [chuckles]
translation.zh: “我俩不能都穿黑色的啊”

translation.en: Wonderful. -[Jack sighs] -Franklin?
translation.zh: 太好了 富兰克林？

translation.en: He cheated at cards.
translation.zh: 他打牌耍赖

translation.en: [Emily] Only with you, Franklin.
translation.zh: 只是对你 富兰克林

translation.en: One day, I'd just got myself a brand new Jaguar.
translation.zh: 有一天 我刚给自己买了辆美洲豹

translation.en: Richard said, "Let's play for pinks."
translation.zh: 理查德说：“咱们赌车吧？”

translation.en: So I say, "Now, look here, Gilmore. -You keep your hands off my new car." -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 我说：“你看 吉尔摩 你不许碰我的新车”

translation.en: And he smiles and says, "Make me."
translation.zh: 他笑着说：“你试试啊”

translation.en: And next we have--
translation.zh: 然后我们就…

translation.en: Oh, looks like Martin's asleep.
translation.zh: 马丁好像睡着了

translation.en: Lorelai?
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱？

translation.en: -What? -You're up.
translation.zh: -什么？ -该你了

translation.en: [stutters] No. No, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [stammers] Let's... let's...
translation.zh: 咱们…

translation.en: We can wake Martin up, huh?
translation.zh: 我们可以叫醒马丁

translation.en: Hey, Marty. Marty. Babe Paley's in the corner.
translation.zh: 嘿 马丁 贝比帕利来了
