translation.en: -[Emily] Lorelai. -Hmm?
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱

translation.en: Just go.
translation.zh: 你说吧

translation.en: [sighs] The best story... best story.
translation.zh: 最好的故事…

translation.en: There's so many great-- No... no one else wants to go?
translation.zh: 有太多好的… 还有人要说吗？

translation.en: Nope? They don't because it's my turn.
translation.zh: 没有？他们不说因为轮到我了

translation.en: So, um, okay...
translation.zh: 那么好吧…

translation.en: I'm ten, and I ask Dad if...
translation.zh: 我十岁时问爸爸…

translation.en: to play hide and seek, and I went and hid in his steamer trunk,
translation.zh: 是不是要玩捉迷藏 我藏到了他的皮箱里

translation.en: and he left and went to Holland. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他去了荷兰

translation.en: I'm sorry. No, it was Belgium.
translation.zh: 对不起 不 是比利时

translation.en: Or... oh, uh, I'm 15,
translation.zh: 或是…我15岁

translation.en: and we were having our, um, Gilmore Fourth of July party
translation.zh: 我们吉尔摩家庆祝国庆日

translation.en: and Dad was dressed as Paul Revere.
translation.zh: 爸爸打扮成保罗列维尔

translation.en: And I guess I was supposed to be, um, greeting people
translation.zh: 我想我当时应该招待客人

translation.en: or playing the flute with a peg leg,
translation.zh: 或是跟着唱片吹笛子

translation.en: so he came looking for me and he burst into the pool house
translation.zh: 他来找我 冲进泳池边的房间里

translation.en: where I was on the couch with Teddy Wiedemier III,
translation.zh: 我正和泰迪韦德米尔三世 在那里的沙发上

translation.en: and we had just finished, uh... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们刚做完…

translation.en: "The British are coming! The British are--" Anyhow, you get it.
translation.zh: “英国人来了！英国人…” 反正 你们懂的

translation.en: Dad's livid and he's yelling, "Emily, our daughter's losing her virginity
translation.zh: 爸爸很生气 大喊 “我们的女儿就在距离

translation.en: five feet away from the president of J.P. Morgan,"
translation.zh: 摩根大通总裁一米半的地方破处了”

translation.en: which was embarrassing and not true,
translation.zh: 太令人尴尬了 也不是事实

translation.en: because that ship had sailed a long time ago,
translation.zh: 因为那之前早就不是处了

translation.en: like Niña, Pinta, Santa Maria time ago, if you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 很久很久了 你们懂的

translation.en: [snaps fingers] So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, it was not Belgium. It was Croatia.
translation.zh: 对不起 不是比利时 是克罗地亚

translation.en: [Emily] It was wonderful seeing you again.
translation.zh: 再看到你真好

translation.en: We should get together next month maybe. Can we?
translation.zh: 我们应该下个月再聚聚 可以吗？

translation.en: [woman] I'd love to.
translation.zh: 我很乐意

translation.en: [Emily] All right now, you all drive carefully.
translation.zh: 好了 你开车小心

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: -Good night. -[man] Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安 -晚安

translation.en: [softly] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You took me by surprise.
translation.zh: 当时太意外了

translation.en: Not another word.
translation.zh: 不要再说了

translation.en: It was late and there was scotch.
translation.zh: 很晚了 我还喝了威士忌

translation.en: Lorelai, stop talking.
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱 别说了

translation.en: -I didn't mean to-- -[slams glass]
translation.zh: 我不是故意…

translation.en: Don't follow.
translation.zh: 别跟过来

translation.en: Mom...
translation.zh: 妈妈…

translation.en: Mom...
translation.zh: 妈妈…

translation.en: Please, come back.
translation.zh: 求你回来

translation.en: I didn't do it on purpose. I had a brain freeze. I panicked.
translation.zh: 我不是故意的 我脑子乱了 我害怕

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: -[Emily] You two start with the silver. -I didn't know there'd be a... test.
translation.zh: -你们两个从银器开始 -我不知道还有考试

translation.en: A test?
translation.zh: 考试？

translation.en: -Yes. -You didn't know there'd be a test?
translation.zh: -对 -你不知道需要考试？

translation.en: -Is that what you said to me? -I also said I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -你就是要跟我说这个？ -我还说了对不起

translation.en: -Did you? -Yes.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的

translation.en: -Did you? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你说了？ -是的

translation.en: -Did you really? -You're making me doubt it now--
translation.zh: -你真的说了？ -你现在把我也弄糊涂了…

translation.en: I asked you for a story.
translation.zh: 我让你讲个故事

translation.en: "Oh, there was a time when Dad bought me a doll. I loved this doll."
translation.zh: “有次我爸爸给我买了个洋娃娃 我喜欢那个娃娃”

translation.en: Something like that. Get out! Now!
translation.zh: 类似这样的 出去！快！

translation.en: -"I remember when he took me to the park." -He didn't take me to a park.
translation.zh: “我记得他带我去公园” 他没带我去过公园

translation.en: -The zoo. -That either.
translation.zh: -动物园 -也没去过

translation.en: The store! The club! Kathmandu! I don't give a damn where he took you.
translation.zh: 商店！俱乐部！加德满都！ 我才不在乎是哪里

translation.en: All I wanted was a fond anecdote from his only daughter
translation.zh: 我只需要他的独生女 讲一个充满爱的故事

translation.en: and what I got was a rambling diatribe on being abandoned in a steamer trunk.
translation.zh: 得到的却是 被丢在皮箱里的闲话诽谤

translation.en: You have nothing but contempt for this family.
translation.zh: 你从这个家庭得到的只有轻视

translation.en: That is not true.
translation.zh: 这不是真的

translation.en: What did we do to fill you with such contempt?
translation.zh: 我们对你做了什么让你觉得被轻视？

translation.en: Love you? Support you? Love Rory? Support Rory?
translation.zh: 爱你？支持你？爱萝莉？支持萝莉？

translation.en: I'm not filled with contempt.
translation.zh: 我没有觉得被轻视

translation.en: All my other friends have children who worship them,
translation.zh: 我所有其他朋友的孩子们 都崇拜他们

translation.en: who call them every day,
translation.zh: 每天给他们打电话

translation.en: who take pride in the family name and traditions.
translation.zh: 以家族姓名和传统为骄傲

translation.en: I have pride.
translation.zh: 我有骄傲

translation.en: -[dishes shatter] -Your father was a great man. A pillar of the community.
translation.zh: 你父亲是个伟大的人 社区的中流砥柱

translation.en: -A man amongst men. -[voice breaking] I know.
translation.zh: -人中龙凤 -我知道

translation.en: And you dishonor him today like this in his own house.
translation.zh: 你今天在他的房子里令他蒙羞

translation.en: I didn't mean to dishonor him.
translation.zh: 我不是故意令他蒙羞

translation.en: What did you mean to do? Break my heart in public?
translation.zh: 你在故意做什么？ 当着别人伤我的心？

translation.en: -No fun doing it in private anymore? -Mom.
translation.zh: -私下里这样做不够好玩了？ -妈妈

translation.en: I know that you are in massive pain. Believe it or not, I'm in pain, too.
translation.zh: 我知道你心里很难过 不管你信不信 我也很难过

translation.en: I'm tired and my head is spinning, and I haven't eaten in two days.
translation.zh: 我很累 我的心很乱 我两天没有吃东西

translation.en: -You? Not eaten? Please. -Yes, me!
translation.zh: -你？没吃东西？拜托 -对 我！

translation.en: I'm surprised you didn't have a pizza delivered during "Ave Maria."
translation.zh: 我很惊讶你在唱 《万福玛利亚》时没吃披萨

translation.en: Well, I haven't eaten and I drank my weight in single malt scotch.
translation.zh: 我没吃 我喝了太多纯麦威士忌

translation.en: I screwed up. I made a mistake.
translation.zh: 我搞砸了 我犯错误了

translation.en: That was premeditated.
translation.zh: 这不是错误 这是预谋

translation.en: How could it be premeditated if I didn't know it was coming?
translation.zh: 如果我不知道有这样的事 怎么会是预谋的？

translation.en: You never do anything unless it's what you want to do. You never have.
translation.zh: 你不想做的事从来就不会做 你从来不会

translation.en: You blow through life like a natural disaster,
translation.zh: 你这一辈子就像场自然灾害

translation.en: knocking down everything and everyone in your path.
translation.zh: 谁碰到你谁倒霉

translation.en: -Did Luke know what he was getting into? -Don't.
translation.zh: -卢克知道他面对的是什么吗？ -别说了

translation.en: Did you ever ask him what he wanted?
translation.zh: 你没问过他他想要什么吗？

translation.en: Where he wanted to live? If he wanted children?
translation.zh: 他想要在哪儿住？想要孩子吗？

translation.en: I'm sure that didn't matter to Lorelai Gilmore.
translation.zh: 当然这些对罗蕾莱吉尔摩来说 无关紧要

translation.en: Nothing matters to her except what she wants and feels.
translation.zh: 除了她自己的想法 自己的感觉 其他的事都无关紧要

translation.en: God help you if she thinks you've wronged her.
translation.zh: 如果她认为你误解了她 求神帮助你吧

translation.en: She will hold onto that grudge forever waiting to get back at you.
translation.zh: 她会揪着这种怨恨不放 等待反击你

translation.en: I made a mistake! A goddamn mistake! You've never let me make a mistake ever.
translation.zh: 我犯了个错误！该死的错误！ 你从来没让我犯过错误

translation.en: Not once in my life, which is how we always find ourselves here.
translation.zh: 我一辈子一次都没有 所以我们现在才会这样

translation.en: -Where? -Standing in the middle of this room
translation.zh: -哪样？ -站在屋子中间

translation.en: yelling at each other like idiots!
translation.zh: 像傻瓜一样吼对方！

translation.en: How dare you call me an idiot! I just lost my husband!
translation.zh: 你怎么敢是说我是傻瓜！ 我刚刚失去了丈夫！

translation.en: [crying] I just lost my father!
translation.zh: 我刚刚失去了父亲！

translation.en: And you couldn't care less!
translation.zh: 你根本不关心！

translation.en: [inhales sharply] That's horrible.
translation.zh: 这太可怕了

translation.en: You're horrible.
translation.zh: 你太可怕了

translation.en: Get out!
translation.zh: 出去！

translation.en: First the help, then me. Seems about right.
translation.zh: 先是帮手 然后是我 看起来不错

translation.en: Go home!
translation.zh: 回家去！

translation.en: Go back to your beloved town with its carnies and misfits.
translation.zh: 回到那个爱你的城镇 那里充满了欺诈和哄骗

translation.en: Tell them how your intolerable mother yelled at you at your father's funeral.
translation.zh: 去告诉他们你可怕的妈妈 在父亲的葬礼上对你大喊大叫

translation.en: They can all console you and tell you what a witch I am
translation.zh: 他们可以安慰你 可以告诉你我是个巫婆

translation.en: and how perfect you are!
translation.zh: 而你有多完美！

translation.en: Full freakin' circle.
translation.zh: 又回到原点了

translation.en: You couldn't have just said he was well-read?
translation.zh: 你就不能只说他很博学吗？

translation.en: -[voice breaking] I know. -"My father. Boy, did he love books."
translation.zh: 我知道 “我父亲 天啊 他可真爱书”

translation.en: I know, I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: "And stamps. Whoo, that stamp collection."
translation.zh: “还有邮票 收集邮票”

translation.en: I was under a lot of pressure. You weren't there.
translation.zh: 我当时压力很大 你又不在

translation.en: And how did you neglect to tell me this?
translation.zh: 你怎么没告诉我这件事呢？

translation.en: -Oh, I didn't think she was mad anymore. -You didn't?
translation.zh: -我以为她不生气了呢 -你以为？

translation.en: Well, I assumed she was, because she hadn't answered
translation.zh: 我想她还在生气 因为过去四个月里

translation.en: any of my calls or e-mails for the last four months,
translation.zh: 她不接我电话 不回我邮件

translation.en: but I thought she'd hide it in front of you.
translation.zh: 但我以为在你面前她会掩饰一下

translation.en: [scoffs] Because that's ever happened.
translation.zh: 因为以前曾经这样过

translation.en: What could possibly elicit that kind of smile in this house?
translation.zh: 在这个家里 怎么还能那样笑？

translation.en: It smells meaty.
translation.zh: 闻到有肉味儿

translation.en: Yes, but what kind of meat?
translation.zh: 是啊 不过是哪种肉呢？

translation.en: And there's cheese, and layers of...
translation.zh: 有奶酪 好多层…

translation.en: -It's crunchy. -Huh.
translation.zh: 脆脆的

translation.en: [Lorelai] No, wait, it's smooshy. It's crunchy and smooshy.
translation.zh: 不 等等 滑滑的 是脆脆的和滑滑的

translation.en: -What's crunchy and smooshy? -Peanut butter? Or badly mixed cement?
translation.zh: -什么东西脆脆的滑滑的？ -花生酱？没和好的水泥？

translation.en: So we've got meat, cheese, peanut butter or badly mixed cement.
translation.zh: 有肉 奶酪 花生酱或是 没和好的水泥

translation.en: For God's sake, just eat it.
translation.zh: 求你们了 快吃吧

translation.en: I'll tell you what, I'll dive in first.
translation.zh: 告诉你们 我先来尝尝

translation.en: Mom always made me taste her food before she'd eat a bite.
translation.zh: 妈妈总是在吃东西之前让我先尝尝

translation.en: Mmm. Delicious. And it could be peanut butter.
translation.zh: 真好吃 -应该是花生酱 -对

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: I appreciate you inviting me to dinner. It was harrowing out there.
translation.zh: 谢谢你请我来吃饭 外面很不好受

translation.en: Who is this?
translation.zh: 这是谁？

translation.en: Kirk, your car broke down at the end of the driveway.
translation.zh: 你的车在车道尽头出了故障

translation.en: It's lucky for me I'm a very loud crier.
translation.zh: 幸亏我哭声很大

translation.en: If your maid hadn't heard my sobs, I don't know what would've happened.
translation.zh: 要不是你的女仆听到我的哭声 我不知道会发生什么事

translation.en: -You would've run out of Kleenex. -It's nice we can joke about it now.
translation.zh: 你的面巾纸或许会被用光 现在可以为此开玩笑真是不错

translation.en: Thanks for letting me stash some boxes here, Grandma.
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我放些箱子在这里 外婆

translation.en: -Where are you going to live? -I'll get my own place again, eventually.
translation.zh: -你要住在哪里？ -我又要找自己的地方

translation.en: For now she's Jack Kerouac. She's On the Road-ing it.
translation.zh: 现在她是杰克凯鲁亚克 她“在路上”

translation.en: Pass the peyote.
translation.zh: 尝试仙人掌

translation.en: But after you've passed the peyote, what bathroom will you use to throw up in?
translation.zh: 但在你尝试过仙人掌之后 想去哪个卫生间吐呢？

translation.en: Well, I have many options. Paris lets me stay with her in New York.
translation.zh: 我有许多选择 帕里斯让我在纽约时和她住一起

translation.en: -Or I can stay with Mom, Lane or you. -So you're homeless.
translation.zh: -我也可以和妈妈、莱恩或你住一起 -这么说 你无家可归了

translation.en: -[doorbell rings] -I am not homeless.
translation.zh: 我不是无家可归

translation.en: -But you don't live anyplace. -Just for now.
translation.zh: -但你居无定所 -只是暂时的

translation.en: You're okay with this vagabond existence she's leading? Like... like a groupie?
translation.zh: 你喜欢这种流浪的状态吗？ 像是追星族？

translation.en: I wish she was a groupie. I'd get better tickets to stuff.
translation.zh: 我倒希望她是追星族 那样就可以弄到更好的门票

translation.en: -Luke! Buddy! -Hey, everybody. Emily.
translation.zh: -卢克！伙计！ -大家好 艾米丽

translation.en: -Careful! -Oh, sorry, sorry, sorry.
translation.zh: -小心！ -对不起

translation.en: -No, I'll do that. -Oh, sure.
translation.zh: -不 我来吧 -当然了

translation.en: [Lorelai] Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: 谢谢你来 亲爱的

translation.en: Yes. Saved us all a very expensive cab ride.
translation.zh: 是啊 让我们都省得花那么贵的车费

translation.en: Are you all leaving now? We all just sat down.
translation.zh: 你们都要走了吗？我们刚坐下

translation.en: Oh, no, please. Just eat. Um, no rush. I can just, uh...
translation.zh: 不 拜托 吃吧 不着急 我可以…

translation.en: This really is delicious.
translation.zh: 这个真好吃

translation.en: Oh, thank you. [breathes deeply]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You don't like it?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢？

translation.en: What? Oh, uh... [softly] Okay.
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 没事

translation.en: Very good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Isn't it? I could eat here every night.
translation.zh: 不是吗？我可以每天来这里吃

translation.en: -Luke? -Hmm, yes?
translation.zh: -卢克？ -嗯？

translation.en: What do you think about Rory's living situation?
translation.zh: 你觉得萝莉这种居住状态怎么样？

translation.en: -Um... -Her traipsing around
translation.zh: 她临时住在这家或是那家

translation.en: from one couch to another like she's Llewyn Davis.
translation.zh: 就好像她是莉维恩戴维斯

translation.en: Oh, it's fine.
translation.zh: 这样很好

translation.en: Well, I mean... you know, she's grown, and she's...
translation.zh: 我是说 她长大了 她…

translation.en: Uh, did you read her New Yorker piece that she wrote? I put it on the menu.
translation.zh: 你读过她在《纽约客》上的文章吗？ 我印在菜单后面了

translation.en: Why is everyone treating this like it's a normal rite of passage?
translation.zh: 为什么大家都觉得这样很正常呢？

translation.en: Rory is a 32-year-old college-educated woman with no permanent address.
translation.zh: 萝莉32岁了 上过大学 却还居无定所

translation.en: That's not normal.
translation.zh: 这不正常

translation.en: Um, can I be excused?
translation.zh: 我可以失陪吗？

translation.en: They're playing soccer and they seem to be short a man.
translation.zh: 他们在玩足球 似乎缺个人手

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Hi, I'm Kirk! Over here!
translation.zh: 嗨 我是柯克！这里！

translation.en: Explain to me again who that person is?
translation.zh: 再给我解释一下这人是谁？

translation.en: -Oh, that I could. -Grandma, don't worry about me.
translation.zh: -哦 可以的 -外婆 别担心我

translation.en: I know exactly what I'm doing. I'm busier than I've ever been.
translation.zh: 我知道自己在做什么 我比以往任何时候都更忙

translation.en: I'm traveling and pursuing a goal.
translation.zh: 我在旅行 追求一个目标

translation.en: I don't have to store my stuff here if you're going to worry.
translation.zh: 如果你担心的话 我可以不把东西寄存在这里

translation.en: You can leave your things here. That's not what I meant.
translation.zh: 你可以把东西放这里 我不是这个意思

translation.en: -There's a chair now. -Oh, sure.
translation.zh: -现在有椅子了 -当然了

translation.en: [Kirk] Goal!
translation.zh: 射门！

translation.en: Call me from London.
translation.zh: 到了伦敦给我打电话

translation.en: -Luke. -Yes?
translation.zh: -卢克？ -嗯？

translation.en: -That was just my way of saying goodbye. -Oh, goodbye.
translation.zh: -这是我告别的方式 -再见

translation.en: -Good night, Mom. -Kirk, we're leaving!
translation.zh: -晚安 妈妈 -柯克 我们走了！

translation.en: -Talk tomorrow. -Yep.
translation.zh: -明天说吧 -好

translation.en: [Luke] Kirk! Now!
translation.zh: 柯克！快点！

translation.en: -Thank you, Luke. -Oh, you're welcome, Kirk.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 卢克 -不客气 柯克

translation.en: Before I go, we should get our stories straight about what happened.
translation.zh: 在我走之前 我们编好故事

translation.en: Your car broke down, I drove to Hartford, and drove you back home.
translation.zh: 你的车坏了 我开车去哈特福特 载你回家

translation.en: Or you broke down, I drove to Hartford and picked you up,
translation.zh: 还是你的车坏了 我开车去哈特福特 然后接上你

translation.en: and drove you back home.
translation.zh: 再送你回家

translation.en: -What? -Much better story.
translation.zh: -什么？ -这故事更好

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: My business is young, Luke. There's kinks to work out.
translation.zh: 我的生意还不成熟 卢克 很多问题要解决

translation.en: People don't want to know how the sausage gets made.
translation.zh: 人们不会想知道香肠是怎么做的

translation.en: They just want to eat.
translation.zh: 他们只想吃

translation.en: There's no arguing or even responding to that, Kirk.
translation.zh: 柯克 这个问题不必再争论了

translation.en: -Great. Thank you. -[Petal oinking]
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Petal, stop right now!
translation.zh: 花瓣 站住！

translation.en: I know you hear me! I know you hear me!
translation.zh: 我知道你听到了！

translation.en: You get back here! Curb right! Curb right!
translation.zh: 你回来！往右边拉！

translation.en: -[man] Go, Petal! -[Kirk] Don't encourage her.
translation.zh: -快 花瓣！ -别鼓励她

translation.en: -What's all this? -What?
translation.zh: -这都是什么？ -什么？

translation.en: Dictionary, thesaurus, Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy...
translation.zh: 字典 辞典 《自然哲学的数学法则》…

translation.en: Aw, you got a letter from April.
translation.zh: 有封艾谱莉给你的信

translation.en: I was two hours into deciphering it when I got your call.
translation.zh: 接到你电话之前 我用了两个小时解密

translation.en: "Hello, Pater--"
translation.zh: “你好 帕特…”

translation.en: -"Father," British or Latin. -Sure.
translation.zh: -“父亲”英语或是拉丁语 -当然了

translation.en: She used the word "ontological" three times.
translation.zh: “本体论”这个词她用了三次

translation.en: She used it last time. I looked it up and forgot it.
translation.zh: 上次她用过这个词 我查过又忘了

translation.en: I was looking it up again when you called.
translation.zh: 你来电话时我又查了一次

translation.en: That's what you get when you spawn an MIT-going genius.
translation.zh: 你生了上麻省理工的天才 结果就是这样

translation.en: Rory's smart. She speaks like she doesn't need subtitles.
translation.zh: 萝莉很聪明 她说话好像都不需要字幕解释似的

translation.en: But she grew up with me.
translation.zh: 对 可她是和我长大的

translation.en: She learned her language skills via The Breakfast Club.
translation.zh: 她的谈话技巧 是跟着《早餐俱乐部》学的

translation.en: -Hey, how old is this coffee? -Old.
translation.zh: -嘿 这杯咖啡有多久了？ -很久了

translation.en: Oh, well.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Hey, Luke-- -What are you doing?
translation.zh: -嘿 卢克… -在干嘛？

translation.en: -Eating sprinkles. -Wait, but... Never mind.
translation.zh: -吃思冰客甜点 -等等 可是…算了

translation.en: Uh, did I tell you?
translation.zh: 我告诉过你吗？

translation.en: Michel's husband Frederick wants a baby.
translation.zh: 米歇尔的丈夫弗雷德里克想要个孩子

translation.en: Frederick, the guy who ordered three pancakes on three separate plates?
translation.zh: 弗雷德里克 那个点了三个煎饼 要放在三个盘子里那个人？

translation.en: The town ought to buy another pig.
translation.zh: 小镇应该集资再买只猪

translation.en: -[laughs] -I can't watch this anymore.
translation.zh: 我看不下去了

translation.en: Hey, Luke... did you ever want a kid?
translation.zh: 嘿 卢克 你想要孩子吗？

translation.en: -I have a kid. -I mean a fresh kid.
translation.zh: -我有孩子 -我是说新的孩子

translation.en: [scoffs] What the hell is a fresh kid?
translation.zh: 新的孩子是什么？

translation.en: A kid that's fresh. A kid with me.
translation.zh: 就是新的孩子 和我生的孩子

translation.en: We never had a serious conversation about it, I don't think.
translation.zh: 关于这个问题 我们从来没正式谈过

translation.en: That moment at the Twickham house, but since then...
translation.zh: 在威克姆别墅那会儿 不过那之后…

translation.en: I figured if you wanted another kid you would say something.
translation.zh: 我觉得如果你再要个孩子的话 你会说的

translation.en: I figured if you wanted another kid, you'd say something.
translation.zh: 我以为如果你想要的话 你会说的

translation.en: -I brought it up once. -When?
translation.zh: -我提过一次 -何时？

translation.en: -Five, six years ago. -I don't remember.
translation.zh: -五六年前 -不记得了

translation.en: At the little league game.
translation.zh: 在小联盟比赛时

translation.en: The kid playing right field walked off mid-inning to use the bathroom.
translation.zh: 那个踢右锋的孩子中场时来上厕所

translation.en: I turned to you and I said, "That's the kid."
translation.zh: 我转向你说：“这个孩子真好”

translation.en: -"That's the kid"? -Yes.
translation.zh: -“这个孩子真好”？ -对

translation.en: "That's the kid" is how you say you want to have a kid?
translation.zh: 你想要孩子的时候就会说 “这个孩子真好”？

translation.en: In so many words.
translation.zh: -言简意赅 -不

translation.en: No, that is not you saying you want to have a kid.
translation.zh: “这个孩子真好”不是说你想要孩子

translation.en: "That's the kid" is acknowledging the kid about whom you said,
translation.zh: “这个孩子真好” 指的是你说的这个孩子

translation.en: -"That's the kid." -I thought you knew what I meant.
translation.zh: “这个孩子真好” 我以为你知道我的意思

translation.en: Impossible, because I don't speak "huh"?
translation.zh: 不可能 因为我没说“嗯”？

translation.en: Well... that's what I thought and you didn't pursue it, so...
translation.zh: 我以为你不想为此努力 所以…

translation.en: -It was up to me to pursue it? -No.
translation.zh: -是该我努力吗？ -不是

translation.en: Sorry, I...
translation.zh: 对不起 我…

translation.en: Well, how do you feel about it now? -What? -[sighs]
translation.zh: -你现在觉得呢？ -什么？

translation.en: Do you still want a kid?
translation.zh: 你还想要孩子吗？

translation.en: Oh, well, I mean... I mean, isn't it, uh, too late?
translation.zh: 我是说 不太晚了吗？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Look, forget it.
translation.zh: -我不知道 -听着 算了吧

translation.en: I have kids. I have April
translation.zh: 我有孩子 我有艾谱莉

translation.en: and I've always considered Rory to be a little bit mine, so...
translation.zh: 我一直觉得萝莉也算是我的孩子 所以…

translation.en: Yeah, but she was so much fun to raise. Don't you want to have that kind of fun?
translation.zh: 对 但养大她很好玩 你不想养个孩子玩吗？

translation.en: I have fun. Look at all the chairs I get to put on tables.
translation.zh: 我已经觉得很好玩了 看看这些我放在桌子上的椅子

translation.en: You don't wanna toss a ball around with your son?
translation.zh: 你不想和你儿子玩球吗？

translation.en: -There's Jess. -I said toss a ball "with" not "at."
translation.zh: -有杰斯 -我说的是一起玩球 不是用球打他

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我不用

translation.en: -You'll never see your kid's graduation. -I went to Rory's graduation.
translation.zh: 你看不到孩子毕业 我参加过萝莉的毕业典礼

translation.en: -It's not the same. -I know it's not the same.
translation.zh: -不一样的 -我知道不一样的

translation.en: I don't want you to miss out on anything.
translation.zh: 我不想让你错过任何东西

translation.en: Nobody gets to have everything they want in life.
translation.zh: 在生活中 没有人会得到所有想要的东西

translation.en: All in all, I think I did pretty good.
translation.zh: 说到底 我觉得我很不错了

translation.en: [woman on TV] Okay, Sandy, see you then.
translation.zh: 好吧 桑迪 回头见

translation.en: -[man] Who's Sandy? -[woman] Do you have to know everything?
translation.zh: -桑迪是谁？ -你一定要什么都知道吗？

translation.en: [man] I'm your best friend and business partner, so yes.
translation.zh: 我是你最好的朋友和生意伙伴 所以是的

translation.en: [woman] Sandy is our surrogate.
translation.zh: 桑迪是我们的代孕妈妈

translation.en: -[man] You're doing it. -[woman] We're thinking about it.
translation.zh: -你在做了 -我们在考虑

translation.en: [man in sing-song] Exciting!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: [woman] I just hope it works. A baby would really help everything.
translation.zh: 我只是希望能成功 有个宝宝真的会对一切有帮助

translation.en: -[child] We want cake! -[woman] Coming. Take it.
translation.zh: -我们要吃蛋糕！ -来拿吧

translation.en: [man] Who's gonna help me light the candles?
translation.zh: 谁来帮我点蜡烛？

translation.en: -[child] I will, I will! -[man] Fun, fun, fun!
translation.zh: -我来！ -真好玩！

translation.en: Here you go. Freshly made.
translation.zh: 给你 新鲜的

translation.en: Thanks. It's been at least an hour since my last infusion.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我上次喝是一个小时之前了

translation.en: So, I have all your paperwork. I'll make sure everything's in order.
translation.zh: 我拿了你全部的材料 我会确认一切井井有条

translation.en: -You can flip through this while you wait. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -你等的时候可以翻翻这个 -谢谢

translation.en: Really good coffee.
translation.zh: 咖啡真不错

translation.en: -Is it? -Yep. Strong. A little crunchy.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -对 很浓 带点儿脆劲儿

translation.en: Good. Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Okay, I will take a look.
translation.zh: 好 我看一下

translation.en: -You're supposed to be looking with me. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -你应该和我一起看 -对不起

translation.en: So, what are we looking at here?
translation.zh: 这是什么东西？

translation.en: -Potential surrogates. -Surrogates. Yes.
translation.zh: -可能的代孕妈妈 -代孕妈妈 对

translation.en: And these surrogates will...
translation.zh: 这些代孕妈妈会…

translation.en: -Carry the baby. -Our baby.
translation.zh: -生宝宝 -我们的宝宝

translation.en: -Yes. They'll carry our baby. - I'm confused.
translation.zh: 对 她们会生我们的宝宝 我很疑惑 我要和这些女人上床吗？

translation.en: Am I supposed to be having sex with these women?
translation.zh: 我很疑惑 我要和这些女人上床吗？

translation.en: -What? -I don't wanna have sex with her.
translation.zh: -什么？ -因为我不想和她上床

translation.en: No, you're not having sex with these women.
translation.zh: 不 你不用和这些女人上床

translation.en: -What? You'd have sex with her? -No.
translation.zh: -怎么？你想和她上床？ -不

translation.en: -How about her? -No.
translation.zh: -那这个呢？ -不

translation.en: She's holding a bat. You could play softball and do it in the dugout.
translation.zh: 她拿着个球拍 你可以和她玩垒球 然后在休息区干

translation.en: I don't want to have sex with her or any of these women.
translation.zh: 我不想和这些女人中的任何一个上床

translation.en: I don't want to have sex with anyone ever.
translation.zh: 我不想和任何人上床

translation.en: -Except me. -[sighs] Lorelai, why are we here?
translation.zh: -除了我 -罗蕾莱 我们来这里干什么？

translation.en: I tried to broach the subject of adoption.
translation.zh: 我试图提出收养

translation.en: I don't want to go to Bangladesh to get a baby.
translation.zh: 我不想去孟加拉带个孩子回来

translation.en: I don't want to go to Woodbury to get a light bulb.
translation.zh: 我不想去伍德伯里买个电灯泡

translation.en: If you won't adopt, this may be our only option,
translation.zh: 除了收养 这可能是我们唯一的选择

translation.en: -and I don't want another picture window. -[sighing] What?
translation.zh: -我不想再要个落地窗 -什么？

translation.en: When we remodeled the house, you wanted a picture window,
translation.zh: 我们装修房子时 你想要个落地窗

translation.en: but it looked weird with the other windows and so you gave it up. You settled.
translation.zh: 但它和其他窗户放在一起很奇怪 所以你放弃了 委曲求全

translation.en: I do not remember wanting a picture window.
translation.zh: 我不记得想要落地窗了

translation.en: Well, you did. Now it's another thing on the list of
translation.zh: 你想要过 这只是其中一项 清单的名字是

translation.en: "things I don't have because I'm with Lorelai."
translation.zh: “我和罗蕾莱在一起没有的东西”

translation.en: -Like peace. -And a picture window.
translation.zh: -比如和平 -还有落地窗

translation.en: I do not want a picture window.
translation.zh: 我不想要落地窗

translation.en: [Paris] Moron! When I say "a VIP," I mean a VIP.
translation.zh: 笨蛋！我说“重要人物” 就是重要人物

translation.en: [woman] I got them coffee.
translation.zh: 我给他们拿了咖啡

translation.en: [Paris] If we were Starbucks, you'd be employee of the month.
translation.zh: 如果我们这是星巴克 你就是本月最佳员工

translation.en: Since we're not, you're just the first Smith grad I've fired this week.
translation.zh: 相反 你是我本周要开除的第一个

translation.en: Lorelai! So great to see you! I am so sorry for the wait.
translation.zh: 罗蕾莱！见到你真好！抱歉让你等

translation.en: -Paris, that's fine. -Don't stand there shaking. Just go.
translation.zh: -帕里斯 没关系的 -别站在这里发抖 去吧

translation.en: Apologize to your parents.
translation.zh: 向你的父母道歉

translation.en: Tell them you'll pay them back for the semesters you studied
translation.zh: 告诉他们你研究 《捉鬼者巴菲》对女性议程的影响

translation.en: Buffy the Vampire Slayer's effect on the feminist agenda.
translation.zh: 那个学期的学费你会还给他们的

translation.en: -Okay, so, hello, Luke. -Hi.
translation.zh: -好 你好 卢克 -嗨

translation.en: -You remember me. -You're hard to forget.
translation.zh: -你记得我 -很难忘掉

translation.en: Flattering. Let's go.
translation.zh: 真是受宠若惊 走吧

translation.en: Now, I rarely act as a case personal liaison anymore,
translation.zh: 现在 我很少做个案了

translation.en: but when I heard it was you coming in, I said,
translation.zh: 但当我听说你进来了 我说

translation.en: "That woman was practically my second mother.
translation.zh: “她几乎算是我第二个妈妈

translation.en: No one else is handling this case."
translation.zh: 必须我来处理这个案子”

translation.en: Aw, that's very sweet of you, Paris.
translation.zh: 你真好 帕里斯

translation.en: So, the spiel. Dynasty Makers.
translation.zh: 先介绍一下 王朝制造者

translation.en: We are the largest full-service fertility
translation.zh: 我们是西半球

translation.en: and surrogacy clinic in the Western Hemisphere.
translation.zh: 最大的生育及代孕诊所

translation.en: No other company offers more services, medical and legal,
translation.zh: 提供最多的医疗和法律服务

translation.en: and no company has a higher approval rating.
translation.zh: 在同行业内评价最高

translation.en: Did you check Yelp?
translation.zh: 你看过Yelp点评网站吗？

translation.en: -No. -Check Yelp.
translation.zh: -没有 -去看看

translation.en: -Oh. -So, you know how this works?
translation.zh: 你们了解过程吗？

translation.en: Uh, we look through there and pick?
translation.zh: 我们看看 挑选一下？

translation.en: Give me that. Bargain-basement breeders.
translation.zh: 给我 都是廉价货

translation.en: I'm not letting any of those bottle-service bimbos carry your baby.
translation.zh: 我不会让这些低等货色给你们生宝宝

translation.en: No, for you I pull out the prime meat.
translation.zh: 不 我把最好的给你

translation.en: Am I blacking out?
translation.zh: 停电了吗？

translation.en: How's Rory? She back from London?
translation.zh: 萝莉怎么样？她从伦敦回来了？

translation.en: She was, but she's there now.
translation.zh: 回来过 现在又回去了

translation.en: -Hard to keep track of our girl, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -很难抓住这个姑娘了 对吧？ -是啊

translation.en: Okay. So, it's pretty cut and dry here.
translation.zh: 这里很无聊

translation.en: We plant an egg in a viable body, we fertilize it and out comes a baby.
translation.zh: 我们把一个卵子放进能生育的身体里 培育它 出来一个婴儿

translation.en: Bing bang boom. Have you thought about eggs?
translation.zh: 砰的一下 你们想过卵子吗？

translation.en: -Uh... -Using eggs over age 44 with IVF,
translation.zh: 用超过44岁人的卵子试管受精

translation.en: the chances of having a baby is about 1% per try.
translation.zh: 每次的成功率是1%

translation.en: -Wow, super fun fact. -She keep you in stitches, this one?
translation.zh: -多有趣的事实啊 -她总是让你大笑吧？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Hey, how much is this gonna cost?
translation.zh: 是啊 这要多少钱？

translation.en: A lot. But, again, Lorelai's the only mother I ever had,
translation.zh: 许多钱 不过 再说一次 罗蕾莱是我除了索莱达保姆之外

translation.en: except for Nanny Soledad, so there's mondo discounts involved.
translation.zh: 唯一的母亲 所以我给她许多折扣

translation.en: How much time did you spend with this girl?
translation.zh: 你陪她待了多久？

translation.en: -So, Luke. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -那么 卢克 -在

translation.en: How are the boys?
translation.zh: 男孩子们怎么样？

translation.en: -What? What is she doing? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -什么？她在干什么？ -不知道

translation.en: I'm good at visually sussing out the situation down there.
translation.zh: 我很擅长估算那里的情况

translation.en: Please stop sussing.
translation.zh: 不要估算了

translation.en: From a cursory glance, you seem symmetrical and well-balanced.
translation.zh: 瞥一眼就知道你很健康

translation.en: Make sure he sticks with the boxers.
translation.zh: 确保他继续穿四角裤

translation.en: Okay, here's a sampling of what we've got.
translation.zh: 好吧 这里有我们的样本

translation.en: Blondes, brunettes and redheads.
translation.zh: 金发 深褐色头发 红头发

translation.en: Tall, short, athletic, artsy.
translation.zh: 高个子 矮个子 运动员 艺术家

translation.en: We even got 'em with a little extra junk in the trunk,
translation.zh: 我们有很多屁股大点的

translation.en: if you secretly like 'em that way, Luke.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢的话 卢克

translation.en: I'm sorry. Am I or am I not having sex with this woman?
translation.zh: 对不起 我要和其中一个女人上床吗？

translation.en: That's a sick thought.
translation.zh: 这样想真恶心

translation.en: You're not having sex with her. She's married.
translation.zh: 你不能和她上床 她结婚了

translation.en: -You made it sound like-- -We've got Jews, Christians,
translation.zh: -你说得好像… -有犹太人、基督徒

translation.en: Muslims, Hindus, atheists, one Wiccan,
translation.zh: 穆斯林、印度人、无神论者、威卡教

translation.en: and for a premium, you can get the cream of the crop,
translation.zh: 作为额外福利 可以给你百里挑一的

translation.en: top of the line, army wives.
translation.zh: 极品 军嫂

translation.en: Sturdy, reliable, great at packing.
translation.zh: 强壮 可靠 擅长打包

translation.en: Oh, wait, sorry. I have to take her off the available list.
translation.zh: 等等 对不起 我得把她从备选名单中拿掉

translation.en: She just conceived. Very high-profile client.
translation.zh: 她刚刚怀孕 非常高大上的客户

translation.en: Let's just call him... Doogie Howser.
translation.zh: 就叫他…天才小医生好了

translation.en: You mean Neil Patrick Harris? Wow. Little louder, please.
translation.zh: -你是说尼尔帕特里克哈里斯？ -哇 拜托声音再大点儿

translation.en: Okay, so now his cover's blown, but, yes, it's Neil Patrick Harris.
translation.zh: 好吧 反正露馅了 是的 就是尼尔帕特里克哈里斯

translation.en: -What kind of a cover-- -It's Neil Patrick Harris.
translation.zh: -什么露馅… -是尼尔帕特里克哈里斯

translation.en: Did you hear? It's Neil Patrick Harris.
translation.zh: 听到吗？是尼尔帕特里克哈里斯

translation.en: -I did hear, yes. -Neil Patrick Harris.
translation.zh: -我听到了 -尼尔帕特里克哈里斯

translation.en: -You look upset, Luke. -No. What makes you think I'm upset?
translation.zh: -你很沮丧 卢克 -不 不沮丧 你怎么会这么想？

translation.en: You're not excited about Neil Patrick Harris.
translation.zh: 尼尔帕特里克哈里斯让你兴奋不起来

translation.en: I'm very excited for Neil Patrick Harris if this is what he wants.
translation.zh: 如果这是他想要的 我很为尼尔帕特里克哈里斯兴奋

translation.en: Is it not what you want? -I... -I understand.
translation.zh: 你不想要这样吗？我明白

translation.en: It's a big decision, having kids.
translation.zh: 要孩子是个重要决定

translation.en: There's rewards, but also constant panic and worry.
translation.zh: 有回报 也有持续的痛苦和担忧

translation.en: Are they healthy? Does everything work? Are they smart?
translation.zh: 他们健康吗？ 一切都好吗？他们聪明吗？

translation.en: McDonald's fry stations are filled with college-educated moderate achievers.
translation.zh: 麦当劳里全是上过大学的成功者

translation.en: And then there's the lottery of nature.
translation.zh: 还有自然的选择

translation.en: I mean, I said to Neil,
translation.zh: 我是说 我对尼尔说

translation.en: "Are you prepared to have a really unattractive child
translation.zh: “你准备好要一个不那么迷人的孩子

translation.en: that would not look good on camera?
translation.zh: 上镜头不会好看吗？

translation.en: Would you be okay if your child
translation.zh: 如果你的孩子不当演员

translation.en: was not an actor but an agent?"
translation.zh: 却当经纪人你会同意吗？”

translation.en: -I need to leave. -Luke, wait.
translation.zh: -我要走了 -卢克 等等

translation.en: Oh. [sighs] Sorry, Paris, I--
translation.zh: 对不起 帕里斯 我…

translation.en: Yes. Go. Talk it through. I'll send you a DVD of my top picks.
translation.zh: 好 走吧 去聊聊 我会把精选DVD发给你

translation.en: I'll also include a copy of Gone Girl.
translation.zh: 还加上一部《消失的爱人》

translation.en: -NPH was great in that. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -那里面尼尔很棒 -谢谢

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Thank you, Francis.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 弗朗西斯

translation.en: Oh, sod it, bring the bottle. We're celebrating.
translation.zh: 该死 把瓶子拿来 我们正庆祝呢

translation.en: I love coming here because they hate that I do.
translation.zh: 我喜欢来这里 因为他们讨厌我来

translation.en: -Really? -They wouldn't let women in
translation.zh: -真的？ -直到八十年代中期

translation.en: until the mid '80s. It was only supposed to be
translation.zh: 他们才允许女人进来 必须是小脚的良家妇女

translation.en: well-behaved wives with tiny feet, not hellions like myself.
translation.zh: 不是我这样的坏女人

translation.en: -[chuckles] -I helped kick open those doors.
translation.zh: 是我帮着叩开了这些门

translation.en: -Oh, thank you, love. -My pleasure, Ms. Shropshire.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 亲爱的 -我的荣幸 什罗浦希尔夫人

translation.en: So, to us.
translation.zh: 敬我们

translation.en: Hellions in arms.
translation.zh: 武装起来的捣蛋鬼

translation.en: Mmm. I must tell you, I've had such amazing feedback
translation.zh: 我必须告诉你 街谈巷议那篇文章

translation.en: for the Talk of the Town piece.
translation.zh: 有很棒的反馈

translation.en: Far more than for anything I've ever written.
translation.zh: 比写我的其他任何东西的反馈都多

translation.en: Oh, I doubt that.
translation.zh: 我很怀疑

translation.en: So, the book.
translation.zh: 那么 这本书

translation.en: -Yes. -I go back and forth,
translation.zh: -对 -我反复想过

translation.en: back and forth, you know.
translation.zh: 反复想

translation.en: I never really wanted to write about myself.
translation.zh: 我从来没有真正想过写我自己

translation.en: My fields are feminism, environmentalism, and who am I?
translation.zh: 我的领域是女权主义 环境主义 以及我是谁？

translation.en: But if I found someone really like-minded who I could write it with,
translation.zh: 但我发现有人和我志趣相投 可以一切写

translation.en: somebody like yourself... Well, that's intriguing.
translation.zh: 比如你自己…真是有趣

translation.en: I've never done anything like this before.
translation.zh: 我以前从来没做过这种事

translation.en: I don't care about that. I only care that it's honest.
translation.zh: 我不在乎 我只在乎诚意

translation.en: -I want to be seen as I am, warts and all. -I'm great with warts.
translation.zh: 我想看看真实的自己 我很擅长批判

translation.en: Even if I waver, if I let my vanity in the door,
translation.zh: 就算我动摇 我退缩

translation.en: you must remain steadfast.
translation.zh: 你一定要保持坚强

translation.en: Francis, what is that?
translation.zh: 弗朗西斯 这是什么？

translation.en: Uh, this is the fluke carpaccio with lime and chilies.
translation.zh: 这是薄切生比目鱼片 加青柠和辣椒

translation.en: Is it?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: And who's the genius who ordered this magnificent dish?
translation.zh: 谁这么有才 点了这道非凡的菜？

translation.en: Uh, Dr. Reynolds over there.
translation.zh: 那边那位雷诺兹医生

translation.en: Would it be possible for this particular plate
translation.zh: 如果这盘特别的菜不见了

translation.en: to go missing and for you to rush back
translation.zh: 你不得不跑到后面

translation.en: and get another one for the darling doctor over there?
translation.zh: 给那位可爱的医生再上一份 这样可能吗？

translation.en: Uh, of course, Naomi.
translation.zh: 当然了 诺米

translation.en: Oh, it's delicious.
translation.zh: 真美味

translation.en: Everything tastes so much better when it's stolen.
translation.zh: 偷来的东西都很美味

translation.en: Mmm, that is good.
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: Mmm, so, let's talk time frame.
translation.zh: 谈谈时间吧

translation.en: I think it'll be about eight weeks to work up a proposal for the publishers
translation.zh: 我想大概需要八个星期 可以给出版商一个提议

translation.en: and supply a sample chapter.
translation.zh: 并提供一章样本

translation.en: How much access can you give me? Interviews are everything.
translation.zh: 我有多少权限？采访之类的

translation.en: Oh, full access, darling. Follow me everywhere except the loo.
translation.zh: 全部权限 跟着我去任何地方 除了卫生间

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Actually, the loo's fine, too.
translation.zh: 实际上 卫生间也可以

translation.en: -Francis, who's that burger for? -Um, Ms. Kipney.
translation.zh: -弗朗西斯 这个汉堡是给谁的？ -吉普尼太太

translation.en: Trust me, she won't enjoy it. Half of it's going to her dog.
translation.zh: 相信我 她不会喜欢的 一半都会喂给她的狗

translation.en: So, um, the only thing left to discuss is financial stuff.
translation.zh: 唯一要讨论的就是财务方面了

translation.en: The lawyers can do that, right?
translation.zh: 这件事律师可以做 对吗？

translation.en: It's 50-50. Split down the middle. We're in this together. Yes?
translation.zh: 是五五分 对半分 我们一起做 对吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Now, keep your eyes peeled for dessert.
translation.zh: 好 准备盯着点甜点吧

translation.en: I can't believe it's only two o'clock. Two o'clock in the afternoon.
translation.zh: 没法相信现在才两点 下午两点

translation.en: I feel like I've been awake for days.
translation.zh: 我觉得我已经醒了好几天了

translation.en: It's the jet lag. And the bourbon. I drank straight bourbon.
translation.zh: 是因为时差 还有波旁威士忌 我喝了威士忌

translation.en: I'm now a midday straight bourbon drinker. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我现在是中午 就会喝波旁威士忌的酒鬼

translation.en: I'm gonna have to keep up with Naomi if I'm going to write this book.
translation.zh: 要是我想写这本书 我就得跟上诺米的节奏

translation.en: She drinks as fast as she talks and she never seems to get tipsy at all.
translation.zh: 她喝酒和说话一样快 好像永远不会喝醉

translation.en: She seemed to get smarter and more coherent.
translation.zh: 看起来她更聪明更智慧了

translation.en: Or maybe she just seems smarter and more coherent.
translation.zh: 或许她只是看起来更聪明更智慧

translation.en: This is great, right?
translation.zh: 这太好了 对吗？

translation.en: I mean, now I have something concrete to talk about at my Condé Nast meeting,
translation.zh: 现在我在康泰纳仕会议上 有重点可以说了

translation.en: and she mentioned publishing excerpts in Vanity Fair, which would be amazing.
translation.zh: 她还提到过《名利场》的发行商 这太棒了

translation.en: It's not really what I do, but it's good for now.
translation.zh: 不是我真正想要的 但目前也还不错

translation.en: [sighs] And it's money. Money is nice.
translation.zh: 还有钱 钱总是好东西

translation.en: Now I have to hang out with her more to get a handle on the first few chapters
translation.zh: 现在我要多陪她 好写出头几章来

translation.en: so we can bid it out and see who wants it.
translation.zh: 这样我们就可以发行 看看谁想买

translation.en: That starts in a month, when she gets back from India.
translation.zh: 她从印度回来之后 一个月内就开始

translation.en: Basically, I had a good day. How was your day?
translation.zh: 其实 我今天过得不错 你呢？

translation.en: Well, I had my dry cleaning delivered.
translation.zh: 我把衣服送干洗了

translation.en: -Oh, I think I win. -I don't know. I really like these pants, so...
translation.zh: -我想我赢了 -那可说不准 我喜欢这条裤子

translation.en: -I'm glad it went well. -It did.
translation.zh: -我很高兴情况不坏 -的确是

translation.en: -Tonight, I'll take you out to celebrate. -I'd like that.
translation.zh: -今晚我要带你出去庆祝 -我喜欢

translation.en: Tomorrow, I'll tell you all I've heard about Naomi Shropshire.
translation.zh: 明天 我给你讲 我听说的诺米什罗浦希尔

translation.en: I don't care if she's difficult.
translation.zh: 我不在乎她是否难缠

translation.en: Oh, she's difficult and a little weird.
translation.zh: 她很难缠 还有点儿奇怪

translation.en: Well, I like weird. I was formed by weird.
translation.zh: 我喜欢奇怪的 我就是奇怪的

translation.en: It could be great, and you deserve that.
translation.zh: 会很好的 你值得拥有

translation.en: I do. I do deserve that.
translation.zh: 的确是 我的确值得

translation.en: Did I tell you she lost her shoes at the club?
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 她把鞋子丢在俱乐部了吗？

translation.en: -You did not. -I didn't notice until we were leaving.
translation.zh: -没有 -我们走的时候我才发现

translation.en: She was walking as if she had shoes on. I mention it and she said,
translation.zh: 她走得像是穿着鞋子 我提醒她 她说

translation.en: "I left them somewhere." How do you do that? It's snowing outside.
translation.zh: “我丢在什么地方了” 怎么能这样呢？外面下着雪呢

translation.en: -See? Weird. -Weird makes good copy.
translation.zh: -看到吗？奇怪吧 -奇怪的人有故事

translation.en: -So does a great writer. -Those pants did put you in a good mood.
translation.zh: -那就做个好作家吧 -那条裤子真让你心情愉悦

translation.en: Do you have to go back to work?
translation.zh: 你非要回去上班吗？

translation.en: The pants can't be the accomplishment of my day.
translation.zh: 今天不能洗条裤子就算完成任务了

translation.en: Plus, I have competition now. You're going to be an author.
translation.zh: 而且 我有竞争对手 你要成为作家

translation.en: -It's not like I'm John McPhee. -Yet.
translation.zh: -我又不是约翰麦克菲 -现在还不是

translation.en: I'll send the car for you at 8:00.
translation.zh: 我让车八点来接你

translation.en: -I'm gonna use your desktop, okay? -All yours.
translation.zh: -我用用你的台式机 好吗？ -随便用

translation.en: -Where are those boxes I sent here? -The maid stuffed them in the closet.
translation.zh: -我送来的箱子在哪里？ -女仆放在衣柜里了

translation.en: -I need to look for something. -Your lucky outfit?
translation.zh: -我要拿些东西 -你的幸运装？

translation.en: -Do not mock. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 不许笑话我

translation.en: I am not mocking. It's a great outfit.
translation.zh: 我没笑话你 那件衣服很棒

translation.en: You were wearing it when I saw you in Hamburg.
translation.zh: 我在汉堡看到你时 你就穿着它

translation.en: Hey, is there anything in here that you don't want me to see?
translation.zh: 嘿 这里有什么 你不希望我看到的吗？

translation.en: -Like body parts? -That would be on the list, sure.
translation.zh: 比如身体部位？ 这当然算了

translation.en: No, like, uh... other girl's things.
translation.zh: 不 比如其他女孩的东西

translation.en: -All clear. -Okay.
translation.zh: -一切安全 -好

translation.en: Hey... I wouldn't do that.
translation.zh: 嘿 我不会那样的

translation.en: Leave things around for you just to...
translation.zh: 把东西放在你周围 就为了…

translation.en: -I wasn't accusing-- -I know. I'm just--
translation.zh: -我不是说你… -我知道 我只是…

translation.en: Look, we have an agreement. What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas.
translation.zh: 听着 我们有协议的 赌城发生的事就结束在赌城

translation.en: [sighs] We do.
translation.zh: 的确是

translation.en: And when we leave Vegas, we forget about Vegas
translation.zh: 我们离开了赌城 就忘掉赌城

translation.en: until we're back in Vegas and then it's just us in Vegas until...
translation.zh: 等我们回到赌城 那就只有我们在赌城 直到…

translation.en: Throw me a rope, man.
translation.zh: 救救我吧

translation.en: I'll see you at 8:00.
translation.zh: 八点见

translation.en: -Your phone. -What's it say?
translation.zh: -你的电话 -上面说什么？

translation.en: "Paul dinner. Don't forget."
translation.zh: “保罗的晚餐 别忘了”

translation.en: -Oh, crap. -That's a lot of exclamation points.
translation.zh: -该死 -有好多惊叹号

translation.en: -I forgot. -It was the excitement about my pants.
translation.zh: -我忘了 -是裤子带来的兴奋 对吗？

translation.en: -Go. Vegas. -But-- Yes. Vegas.
translation.zh: -走吧 赌城 -不过…对 赌城

translation.en: [sighs] I've got to break up with this guy.
translation.zh: 我要和这个人分手

translation.en: -Excuse me, your password? -Wafflehousebutterbob.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你的密码？ Wafflehouse butterbob

translation.en: -Cute. -Isn't it, though?
translation.zh: -可爱 -不是吗？

translation.en: Okay, I'm here now.
translation.zh: 好 我到了

translation.en: Uh-huh. You two, park it over there.
translation.zh: 你们两个 坐那边去

translation.en: No, there is no return policy. What's she going to return? It's a baby.
translation.zh: 没有无退货条款 她要退什么？那可是孩子

translation.en: I'll call and see if she wants it,
translation.zh: 我会打电话看她是否想要

translation.en: but last time it was Brad who put the kibosh on it.
translation.zh: 可是上次是布拉德结束了这一切

translation.en: -Hello, Luke. -Paris, hey.
translation.zh: -你好 卢克 -帕里斯 嘿

translation.en: Could you bring them a salad, no croutons?
translation.zh: 能给他们一份沙拉 不加面包丁吗？

translation.en: Don't let them con you into Diet Cokes.
translation.zh: 别让他们劝你买无糖可乐

translation.en: -I wanted to apologize for the other day. -No need.
translation.zh: -我想要为那天的事道歉 -不用

translation.en: I've been in this racket for years
translation.zh: 我过这种生活很久了

translation.en: and sometimes I'm a little too "let's get down to it."
translation.zh: 有时候我会想：“认真点儿吧”

translation.en: -Think I may have scared you a bit. -Not at all.
translation.zh: -我想我或许吓到你了 -根本没有

translation.en: Look, you just need to know I'm good.
translation.zh: 听着 你只需要知道我很好

translation.en: I'm the Pablo Escobar of the fertility world.
translation.zh: 我是生育行业内的大毒枭

translation.en: I move the best product, and I would like to help.
translation.zh: 我有最好的产品 我愿意帮忙

translation.en: -I appreciate that, but-- -I get it.
translation.zh: -非常感谢 可是… -我明白

translation.en: You're a small-town boy. You get your milk from a cow.
translation.zh: 你是个小镇男孩 你喝牛挤出来的奶

translation.en: Actually, everybody gets their milk from a cow.
translation.zh: 实际上 大家都喝牛挤出来的奶

translation.en: So I thought I'd make it a little more homey for you.
translation.zh: 我想这样可以让你更自在些

translation.en: Girls, I'd like to you meet Luke Danes.
translation.zh: 姑娘们 来见见卢克丹尼斯

translation.en: Jill and Jane are two of my top breeders.
translation.zh: 吉尔和珍是两个最棒的代孕妈妈

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I thought you could all sit and talk.
translation.zh: 我以为你会坐下谈谈

translation.en: Ask them questions. Challenge Jill to an arm wrestle.
translation.zh: 问她们一些问题 和吉尔掰掰腕子

translation.en: I think you'll be pleasantly surprised.
translation.zh: 我想你会很惊喜的

translation.en: Dragonfly Inn.
translation.zh: 蜻蜓旅馆

translation.en: Michel, put Lorelai on the phone.
translation.zh: 米歇尔 让罗蕾莱接电话

translation.en: -Who is calling? -Michel!
translation.zh: -你是谁？ -米歇尔！

translation.en: Oh, Luke. How nice to hear your siren call.
translation.zh: 卢克 又听到你的报警电话真好

translation.en: Find Lorelai and tell her that there are two arm-wrestling breeders here
translation.zh: 找到罗蕾莱告诉她 来了两个会掰腕子的代孕妈妈

translation.en: -and I need her help! -What?
translation.zh: -我需要她的帮助！ -什么？

translation.en: Paris?
translation.zh: 帕里斯？

translation.en: -Rory, hi! -What are you doing here?
translation.zh: -萝莉 嗨！ -你来这里干什么？

translation.en: -Oh, I'm working. -Here?
translation.zh: -我在工作 -在这里？

translation.en: Wherever there's an old or defective uterus.
translation.zh: -哪里的子宫有问题 哪里就有我 -我没挂断

translation.en: -I did not hang up, Michel! -You eating?
translation.zh: -哪里的子宫有问题 哪里就有我 -我没挂断 -你在吃东西？ -不 我买杯咖啡 时差太难受

translation.en: No, I'm just grabbing coffee. So jet-lagged.
translation.zh: -你在吃东西？ -不 我买杯咖啡 时差太难受

translation.en: I'm heading to your place. Oh, can I crash at your place?
translation.zh: 然后我去你那里 我能睡你那里吗？

translation.en: -Absolutely, you have the key. -Find her!
translation.zh: -当然了 你有钥匙 -找到她了！

translation.en: I have to run an errand first. You wanna come with?
translation.zh: 我得先去跑趟腿 你要来吗？

translation.en: Sure. Ladies, I'll be back in a few. Close the deal.
translation.zh: 当然了 女士们 我一会儿就回来 把事情谈好

translation.en: Excuse me? I don't think the Wi-Fi is working.
translation.zh: 打扰一下？我觉得无线网络不能用

translation.en: Capital "B" on "butter." Yeah, I'm still here, Michel.
translation.zh: “butter”里的B大写 对 我还在 米歇尔

translation.en: -Luke! -Not now, Taylor.
translation.zh: -卢克！ -现在不行 泰勒

translation.en: Well, then when? I have called, I've left messages,
translation.zh: 那什么时候行？我打过电话 留过言

translation.en: I even slipped notes under your door at night.
translation.zh: 我还晚上给你门缝里塞过纸条

translation.en: Which I turned over to the FBI.
translation.zh: 我当时就交给联邦调查局了

translation.en: I know for a fact that you have had septic tank issues.
translation.zh: 我知道实际上你有化粪池的问题

translation.en: Taylor, do you see people in here trying to eat?
translation.zh: 泰勒 你看到人们在这里吃东西吗？

translation.en: I do. And you know what happens after they eat?
translation.zh: 我看到了 你知道 他们吃完之后会做什么吗？

translation.en: -Oh, jeez... -It's still not working.
translation.zh: 还是连不上

translation.en: Luke, I love this town. Do you love this town?
translation.zh: 卢克 我爱这个小镇 你呢？

translation.en: -No. -[woman] Excuse me.
translation.zh: -不 -什么

translation.en: Could the capital "B" be on "bob," not "butter"?
translation.zh: 是“bob”不是“butter” 里的B大写？

translation.en: I think this town is destined for greatness.
translation.zh: 我想这个小镇会很棒

translation.en: All the pieces are there.
translation.zh: 所有的东西都在这里

translation.en: It's just a matter of finding that special something
translation.zh: 找到最特别的东西

translation.en: -to put it over the top. -Like a sewer system.
translation.zh: -放在最上面 -比如下水道系统

translation.en: Yes, because when you have a sewer system,
translation.zh: 对 因为当你有下水道系统时

translation.en: then you're part of something bigger than yourself.
translation.zh: 你就参与到了更重要的事情当中

translation.en: -Like the universe, only more hygienic. -Taylor--
translation.zh: -就像宇宙 只是更加卫生 -泰勒…

translation.en: I'm sorry. The password is still not working.
translation.zh: 对不起 密码还是不对

translation.en: Of course the password's not working! It's fake!
translation.zh: 密码当然不对 是假的！

translation.en: He has been giving out fake passwords
translation.zh: 他这里装了无线网络之后

translation.en: ever since he got Wi-Fi in this damn place!
translation.zh: 就一直给人假密码！

translation.en: How stupid are you people anyway?
translation.zh: 你们怎么能这么傻？

translation.en: He doesn't want to give out his password
translation.zh: 他不想给大家他的密码

translation.en: because he doesn't want you here checking your Facebook,
translation.zh: 因为他不希望你们在这里上脸书

translation.en: or answering your e-mails, or YouTubing Zoella,
translation.zh: 或是回邮件 或是在YouTube上看美妆达人

translation.en: or whatever the hell it is you're doing.
translation.zh: 或是不管干什么

translation.en: This isn't your office. It's a diner! Go home!
translation.zh: 这不是你们的办公室 是餐厅！回家吧！

translation.en: Pay for Wi-Fi! I do.
translation.zh: 花钱用无线网络！我就花钱

translation.en: I... can't... [sighs]
translation.zh: 我不能…

translation.en: You know what? Never mind. [sighs]
translation.zh: 你知道吗？算了吧

translation.en: I was wrong. You don't deserve perpetually unclogged toilets.
translation.zh: 我错了 你们就不配有 永远不堵的马桶

translation.en: Taylor!
translation.zh: 泰勒！

translation.en: [Taylor] Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Now that I've gotten--
translation.zh: 既然我…

translation.en: Hell of a week.
translation.zh: 这个星期过得不好

translation.en: [woman singing] ♪ Oh, friends ♪
translation.zh: 哦 朋友们

translation.en: ♪ Waving from a passenger train ♪
translation.zh: 在列车上挥手

translation.en: ♪ Oh, boy ♪
translation.zh: 哦 天啊

translation.en: ♪ Familiar to me in impossible ways ♪
translation.zh: 让我觉得熟悉却不可能

translation.en: ♪ A new day ♪
translation.zh: 新的一天

translation.en: ♪ A picture in my hands Of who I used to be ♪
translation.zh: 手里拿着以前的照片

translation.en: -[troubadour] Hey! -Crap!
translation.zh: -嘿！ -该死！

translation.en: [troubadour] Come back here!
translation.zh: 回来！

translation.en: [woman] Stop it! What is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 站住！你什么毛病？

translation.en: [troubadour] I told you! My town, my corner!
translation.zh: 我跟你说过的！ 这是我的小镇我的角落！

translation.en: [woman] But I'm your sister!
translation.zh: 可我是你妹妹！

translation.en: -[troubadour] No proof of that. -Ask Mom!
translation.zh: -你没有证明 -去问妈妈！

translation.en: [troubadour] Mom lies! You better run, little sister!
translation.zh: 妈妈撒谎！你最好快点跑 小妹妹！

translation.en: [Paris] It was over the minute he wanted to do something creative.
translation.zh: 说实话 他早就想干点儿 有创意的事了

translation.en: Wow, you and Doyle split.
translation.zh: 你和道尔分手了

translation.en: He's a screenwriter now. Have you been to the movies lately?
translation.zh: 他现在是编剧了 你最近去过电影院吗？

translation.en: -I know. -Suddenly he's in jeans
translation.zh: -我知道 -突然他就穿着牛仔裤

translation.en: and wearing faded $200 rock T-shirts with bands on them he's never seen.
translation.zh: 和两百块的摇滚T恤 他从来都没见过那个乐队

translation.en: He's flying out to "the coast," as if this is not a coast.
translation.zh: 他去了“海岸” 就好像这里没有海岸一样

translation.en: He drinks vodka because it has less carbs.
translation.zh: 他喝伏特加 因为碳水化合物含量比较低

translation.en: Then he started selling things and I realized, "This is going to stick."
translation.zh: 然后他开始卖东西 我意识到：“这事要出岔子”

translation.en: I am so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很难过

translation.en: It's fine. I'll kill him in court.
translation.zh: 没事的 我会在法庭上整死他的

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: I'll be using that Def Leppard T-shirt to clean my windows.
translation.zh: 我会用那件威豹乐队的T恤擦窗户

translation.en: [woman] I've been waiting a half hour! It's freezing!
translation.zh: 我等了半个小时！冻死了！

translation.en: [Kirk] You shouldn't have four-starred me last time.
translation.zh: 你上次给我四颗星之前就该想到这个

translation.en: Don't you maybe wanna try to work it out nicely?
translation.zh: 你不想再试试吗？

translation.en: You guys have kids and you were a good team at one point.
translation.zh: 你们有孩子 在某种程度上是个好团队

translation.en: That was before Brett Ratner gave him the keys to his pool house.
translation.zh: 那是在布莱特拉特纳 把游泳池的钥匙给他之前

translation.en: Okay, ladies. You have arrived.
translation.zh: 好了 女士们 你们到了

translation.en: -Thanks, Kirk. -You're welcome. Come again.
translation.zh: -谢谢 柯克 -不客气 再来啊

translation.en: -And does Lane have an extension cord? -I'll see.
translation.zh: -莱恩有延长电线吗？ -我看看

translation.en: I know you guys were friends,
translation.zh: 我知道你们是朋友

translation.en: but if push came to shove, and we had to make T-shirts...
translation.zh: 但如果形势紧张的话 我们就得做T恤…

translation.en: -Team Paris all the way. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -一直都是帕里斯团队 -谢谢

translation.en: Can you say he felt you up at a party for the deposition?
translation.zh: 为了证词 你可以说在我们的圣诞晚会上

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: -他玩你胸吗？ -不可以

translation.en: You're all I've got. Our nanny looks like Benicio Del Toro.
translation.zh: 但我只有你了 我们的保姆看起来就像班尼西欧托罗

translation.en: [Lane] Oh, you're here.
translation.zh: 你来了

translation.en: Remember to call my mom to rate me!
translation.zh: 记得给我妈妈打电话 给我评级！

translation.en: Lane, you remember Paris.
translation.zh: 莱恩 记得帕里斯吧

translation.en: -I do. Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -记得 嗨 -嗨

translation.en: -Um, do you still need your boxes? -[Rory] Yes, definitely.
translation.zh: -你还需要箱子吗？ -当然了

translation.en: [woman] Oh, Kirk, come on!
translation.zh: 柯克 拜托！

translation.en: -I had Zach pull them out for you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -我让扎克给你拿出来 -不客气

translation.en: -[Rory] Thanks, Zach. -Don't look at me. I'm not me.
translation.zh: -谢谢 扎克 -别看我 不是我

translation.en: -What are you trying to find? -My lucky outfit.
translation.zh: -你想找什么？ -我的幸运装

translation.en: -Is it, like, a cheerleader uniform? -Yes, exactly like that.
translation.zh: -就好像啦啦队长制服那种？ -就是那种

translation.en: -[Paris] Is this your house? -Yep.
translation.zh: -这是你的房子？ -是

translation.en: -Who gets it when you split? -What?
translation.zh: -你们分手后归谁？ -什么？

translation.en: -[Brian] Is he him yet? -[Zach] No!
translation.zh: -莱恩 他还老样子？ -不！

translation.en: Rory, are you staying in the spare room?
translation.zh: 萝莉 你住空房间吗？

translation.en: -No, it's all yours, Brian. -Did you get beer?
translation.zh: -不 都归你了 布莱恩 -你还有啤酒吗？

translation.en: [Lane] There should be some in there.
translation.zh: 那边应该有些

translation.en: -Uh, can I help? -Um, yeah. Look through this box.
translation.zh: -要我帮忙吗？ -要 看看那个箱子

translation.en: I'm looking for a red dress, full skirt.
translation.zh: 我在找一件红色衣服 长裙

translation.en: Okay, red dress, full skirt. Oh, this is nice. Wear this.
translation.zh: 好 红色长裙 这件很好看 穿这个吧

translation.en: No, it has to be my lucky outfit.
translation.zh: 不 必须穿我的幸运装

translation.en: My Condé Nast meeting is in two days and I have to find that outfit.
translation.zh: 两天后就是我和康泰纳仕的会面了 我必须找到那件幸运装

translation.en: -[Gil] Is he him yet? -[Zach] No, he's not!
translation.zh: -他还是他吗？ -不是了！

translation.en: I didn't ask for this promotion, okay? Back off.
translation.zh: 我没要求过升职 好吗？后退

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with bringing home the bacon.
translation.zh: 带培根回家没什么错

translation.en: Well, it's not in here. [sighs]
translation.zh: 不在这里

translation.en: Okay. I'm me. Steve! Kwan! Come in here!
translation.zh: 我还是我 史蒂夫！关恩！进来！

translation.en: Help your Aunt Rory find her outfit.
translation.zh: 帮你们萝莉阿姨找衣服

translation.en: -Who did your work? -What?
translation.zh: -你的工作谁做了？ -什么？

translation.en: -Them. Friedman? -I...
translation.zh: -他们 弗里德曼？ -我…

translation.en: -Rasouli? Mendelssohn? -I just had them.
translation.zh: -罗素里？门德尔松？ -我只有这些人

translation.en: Fine. Don't tell me.
translation.zh: 很好 别告诉我

translation.en: Hey. [Lorelai] To answer your 43,000 frantic voicemails,
translation.zh: -嘿 -为了回应你四万三千个语音留言

translation.en: you do not have anything at the dry cleaners.
translation.zh: 烘干机里没有你的东西

translation.en: -Rats. -Seriously, it was Kopelson, right?
translation.zh: -该死 -说真的 是科比尔森 对吗？

translation.en: It wasn't natural. Your husband's junk isn't symmetrical.
translation.zh: 这不正常 你丈夫的蛋蛋不对称

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: It's not here. Maybe it's at Grandma's.
translation.zh: 不在这里 或许在外婆家

translation.en: -How was London? -[sighs] Great.
translation.zh: -伦敦怎么样？ -很好

translation.en: -Where'd you stay? -With Didi. Same as always.
translation.zh: -你住在哪儿了？ -和以前一样住在迪迪那儿

translation.en: I love that you have a friend named Didi. Makes you sound so Fridays on ABC.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你朋友叫迪迪 这让你听起来像ABC周五的节目

translation.en: Have you spoken to Grandma lately?
translation.zh: 你最近和外婆聊过吗？

translation.en: -[grunts] Why? -It's been quiet regarding the blowup.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -一直是生气的状态

translation.en: -I've been busy. -You should call her.
translation.zh: -我很忙 -你应该给她打电话

translation.en: -De-ice this situation. -I will.
translation.zh: -打破这种坚冰 -我会的

translation.en: -When? -When it feels right.
translation.zh: -什么时候？ -等我觉得合适的时候

translation.en: -You are both being stubborn. -Well, she started it.
translation.zh: -你们两个都很固执 -是她先开始的

translation.en: Aren't we supposed to cut her all sorts of slack right now?
translation.zh: 我们不应该对她更宽容些吗？

translation.en: I mean, she lost her husband.
translation.zh: 我是说 她失去了丈夫

translation.en: Did you ever imagine there'd be a Grandma without a Grandpa?
translation.zh: 你想象过外婆没有外公是什么样吗？

translation.en: -No. -Check on her.
translation.zh: -没有 -去看看她

translation.en: Fine. I'll check on her.
translation.zh: 好吧 我去看看她

translation.en: Good. Maybe while you're there, you can find my outfit.
translation.zh: 很好 或许你去的时候 可以找找我的衣服

translation.en: Wow, the student surpasses the master.
translation.zh: 青出于蓝啊

translation.en: -[sighs] Great. -What?
translation.zh: -太好了 -什么？

translation.en: My Condé Nast meeting got pushed again.
translation.zh: 我的康泰纳仕会面又推迟了

translation.en: Aw, sorry, hon. So you don't need that outfit after all?
translation.zh: 对不起 宝贝 那你不需要那件衣服？

translation.en: -You're going. -[cell phone vibrates]
translation.zh: 你要去

translation.en: -Oh, man. -What now?
translation.zh: -哦 天啊 -又怎么了？

translation.en: [sighs] Poor Paul.
translation.zh: 可怜的保罗

translation.en: -Hey, you have got to-- -I know, I know.
translation.zh: -嘿 你得… -我知道

translation.en: -[Zach] All right, let's do this. -[Lane] Yes!
translation.zh: -好 开始吧 -是！

translation.en: So, are they serious?
translation.zh: 他们是认真的吗？

translation.en: One, two!
translation.zh: 一 二！

translation.en: ♪ Pretty soon now You know I'm gonna make a comeback ♪
translation.zh: 很快你就知道我会卷土重来

translation.en: ♪ And like the birds and the bees In the trees ♪
translation.zh: 就像树上的鸟儿和蜜蜂

translation.en: ♪ It's a sure-fire smash ♪
translation.zh: 名声真的火爆

translation.en: ♪ I'll speak To the masses through the media ♪
translation.zh: 我要通过媒体对公众说

translation.en: ♪ But if you got anything to say to me You better say it with cash ♪
translation.zh: 但如果你有话对我说 最好拿现金

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I've got the trash And you got the cash ♪
translation.zh: 因为如果我有货 你有现金

translation.en: ♪ Baby, we should get along fine ♪
translation.zh: 我们就会相处愉快

translation.en: ♪ So give me all your money You know I think I'm funny ♪
translation.zh: 把你的钱都给我 你知道我很搞笑

translation.en: ♪ Can't you see me smiling? Can't you see me laugh, I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: 你是否能看到我在微笑？ 你是否看到我在笑？

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: 就是我

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: 就是我

translation.en: -♪ That gave you the hula hoop ♪ -♪ I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: -这会让你转起呼啦圈 -就是我

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: 就是我

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: 就是我

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man that gave you the yo-yo ♪
translation.zh: 就是我给你摇摇乐

translation.en: -♪ I'm the man ♪ -♪ I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: -就是我 -就是我

translation.en: -♪ I'm the man ♪ -♪ I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: -就是我 -就是我

translation.en: -♪ I'm the man, yeah ♪ -♪ I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man ♪
translation.zh: -就是我 -就是我

translation.en: -Mom? -Hola, hello.
translation.zh: -妈妈？ -你好啊

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: [Emily] Take that box and put it downstairs.
translation.zh: 把那个箱子放到楼下去

translation.en: Come back up here and get these presents.
translation.zh: 回这里来拿出那些礼物来

translation.en: -Mom, are you here? -Lorelai? I didn't know you were coming.
translation.zh: -妈妈 你在这里？ -罗蕾莱？我不知道你会来

translation.en: [gasps] Holy shit!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Berta, these boxes need to go outside.
translation.zh: 伯塔 这些箱子要搬出去

translation.en: -What? What? What? -[Emily] They go outside.
translation.zh: -什么？ -要搬出去

translation.en: Take the boxes. Oh, good.
translation.zh: 拿上那些箱子 好

translation.en: -Did you call? -[stutters] Did I?
translation.zh: -你打过电话吗？ -我打过？

translation.en: Because today is a very bad day.
translation.zh: 因为今天很糟糕

translation.en: What is going on? Who are all these people?
translation.zh: 怎么了？这些人是谁？

translation.en: -Well, that's Berta. -I know Berta.
translation.zh: -那是伯塔 -伯塔我认识

translation.en: That's Berta's husband.
translation.zh: 那是伯塔的丈夫

translation.en: No, that's Berta's husband, that's his brother,
translation.zh: 不 那才是伯塔的丈夫 那是他的弟弟

translation.en: -and I think those are someone's parents. -And the kids?
translation.zh: -我想那俩是某个人的父母 -这些孩子呢？

translation.en: I thought they were all hers, but now I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 我原来以为都是她的 但我现在不确定

translation.en: No, this goes. [stuttering] Mom... what... Can we get a minute?
translation.zh: -不 这个不要 -妈妈 怎么…能说几句话吗？

translation.en: Fine. Uh, could you all give us a minute alone?
translation.zh: 很好 我们可以单独谈几句吗？

translation.en: Mom, "alone" looks a lot like gas.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你这样比划像是说燃气

translation.en: I don't know how else to communicate with them.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么和他们交流

translation.en: Leonard Marlin's daughter works at the UN. I had her come over.
translation.zh: 里奥纳多马琳的女儿在联合国工作 我让她过来

translation.en: She doesn't know what language they speak, either.
translation.zh: 她也不知道他们说的是什么语言

translation.en: Mom, what is going on here?
translation.zh: 妈妈 这到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: -You mean with the house? -Start with the house.
translation.zh: -你说这房子？ -从房子开始说

translation.en: I'm decluttering my life.
translation.zh: 我在整理我的生活

translation.en: -You know Marie Kondo? -No.
translation.zh: -知道藤麻理惠吗？ -不知道

translation.en: -You don't? -No.
translation.zh: -你不知道？ -不知道

translation.en: -She's Japanese. -Okay.
translation.zh: -她是日本人 -好的

translation.en: -You still don't know her? -She's Japanese?
translation.zh: -还不知道？ -她是日本人？

translation.en: -Yes. -No.
translation.zh: -对 -不知道

translation.en: She wrote a best-selling book on decluttering. So, I'm decluttering.
translation.zh: 她写了本最畅销的 关于整理的书 所以我开始整理

translation.en: I was starting to feel claustrophobic.
translation.zh: 我开始感到幽闭恐惧症

translation.en: I'd wake up in the night feeling like the house is closing in on me.
translation.zh: 我夜里醒来 觉得这房子向我压下来

translation.en: -Like I couldn't breathe, you know? -Oh, yes, I know.
translation.zh: -就好像我不能呼吸 -对 我知道

translation.en: One of the ladies in my garden club bought this book,
translation.zh: 我的园艺俱乐部里一位女士 买了这本书

translation.en: The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up.
translation.zh: 《改变人生的整理魔法》

translation.en: She said it made everything better. Are you paying attention?
translation.zh: 她说这会让一切都好起来 你在听吗？

translation.en: -The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up? -You know it?
translation.zh: -《改变人生的整理魔法》？ -你知道？

translation.en: Written by that Japanese woman, Marie Kondo?
translation.zh: 那个日本女人写的 藤麻理惠？

translation.en: -Yes. -No.
translation.zh: -对 -不知道

translation.en: Well, people swear by her.
translation.zh: 人们很崇拜她

translation.en: She tells you to take everything you own and put it in piles on the ground.
translation.zh: 她告诉你把自己所有的东西都拿出来 在地上堆起来

translation.en: Then you pick up each possession and you hold it.
translation.zh: 然后拿起每件东西 拿在手里

translation.en: If it brings you joy, you keep it, and if it doesn't, out it goes.
translation.zh: 如果它让你开心 那就留下 如果不能 那就丢掉

translation.en: No joy.
translation.zh: 不开心

translation.en: -He's taking the dining room chairs. -They don't bring me joy.
translation.zh: -他在拿餐厅的椅子 -它们让我不开心

translation.en: -[sighs] -This box needs to be taped.
translation.zh: 这个箱子需要打包

translation.en: Oh, by the way, if I get a terminal disease,
translation.zh: 对了 如果我得了绝症

translation.en: I want to move to Washington State to die. They let you do that there.
translation.zh: 我想要搬到华盛顿去死 那里是合法的

translation.en: Die? They let you die?
translation.zh: 死？他们让你死？

translation.en: With dignity and in your own time frame.
translation.zh: 带着尊严 按你自己安排的时间死

translation.en: I'll die there and then you need to ship me back here for burial,
translation.zh: 我会死在那里 你要把我运回来办葬礼

translation.en: which costs a fortune, I found out.
translation.zh: 我发现这会花很多钱

translation.en: So, in the safe there's an envelope labeled "body-shipping cash."
translation.zh: 所以在保险柜里有个信封 上面写着“运尸体用现金”

translation.en: I could also go to Vermont,
translation.zh: 我也可以去佛蒙特州

translation.en: but we vacationed there once and it was terrible.
translation.zh: 但我们去度过一次假 那里很不好

translation.en: Squirrels.
translation.zh: 很多松鼠

translation.en: So, Washington it is.
translation.zh: 所以就是华盛顿吧

translation.en: It's the middle of the day.
translation.zh: 现在是中午

translation.en: Taste it. See if it brings you joy.
translation.zh: 尝尝吧 看看是否能让你开心

translation.en: Oh, God. [sighs] I haven't sat down in six hours.
translation.zh: 天啊 我六个小时没有坐下来了

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: -[sighs] -So come on, Mom, talk to me.
translation.zh: 拜托 妈妈 和我说说话

translation.en: [sighs] Why are you wearing jeans?
translation.zh: 你为什么穿着牛仔裤？

translation.en: -What? -Because it's terrifying.
translation.zh: -什么？ -因为这样很可怕

translation.en: I started this process with my closet.
translation.zh: 我在衣柜里也开始这样做了

translation.en: Nothing I owned brought me joy, so I ran out of clothes.
translation.zh: 我有的东西都要带给我快乐 所以我没衣服穿了

translation.en: I don't know where I got these.
translation.zh: 不知道从哪儿找到的

translation.en: -They're mine. -They are?
translation.zh: -这是我的 -是吗？

translation.en: Did you not notice the Billy Squier patch on the butt?
translation.zh: 你没注意到屁股上 有比利斯奎尔的补丁吗？

translation.en: -You can have them back. -I have not been pining for them.
translation.zh: -你可以拿回去 -我不想要了

translation.en: I have to get back to work. Kitchen's next.
translation.zh: 我得回去工作了 接下来是厨房

translation.en: Stop. You're not gonna have anything left.
translation.zh: 停下吧 你会什么都留不下的

translation.en: That's okay. What I do have will bring me joy.
translation.zh: 没关系 我只要带给我快乐的东西

translation.en: Mom...
translation.zh: 妈妈‥

translation.en: nothing is gonna bring you joy right now.
translation.zh: 现在什么都不能带给你快乐

translation.en: Nothing. Your husband just died.
translation.zh: 什么都不行 你的丈夫刚去世

translation.en: When some time passes and you realize you've given away all of your stuff,
translation.zh: 等过段时间 你意识到把精心挑选的东西都扔了

translation.en: you're going to track down and kill Marie Kondo.
translation.zh: 你会找到藤麻理惠 杀掉她的

translation.en: Then you're gonna go to jail wearing those jeans,
translation.zh: 然后就会穿着这条牛仔裤进监狱

translation.en: and the Winchester Mystery Family will be living here in your ball gowns.
translation.zh: 温彻斯特神秘家庭就会住在这里 穿你的舞会长裙

translation.en: -I don't know how to do this. -Do what?
translation.zh: -我不知道该怎么办 -什么怎么办？

translation.en: -Live my life. -Oh, Mom...
translation.zh: -生活 -妈妈…

translation.en: I don't know what to do or where to go.
translation.zh: 我不知道该做什么 该去哪儿

translation.en: I've forgotten which side of the bed to sleep on.
translation.zh: 我忘了该睡在床的哪一边

translation.en: I was married for 50 years.
translation.zh: 我结婚五十年了

translation.en: Half of me is gone.
translation.zh: 我的另一半都死掉了

translation.en: Ah, you don't understand.
translation.zh: 你不明白

translation.en: -I understand. -You can't understand. You're not married.
translation.zh: -我明白 -你不会明白 你没结过婚

translation.en: -Luke and I are as good as married. -No, you're roommates.
translation.zh: -卢克和我就和结婚一样 -不 你们是室友

translation.en: Someday you'll go off and find another roommate.
translation.zh: 有天你会离开寻找其他的室友

translation.en: I had a real partner for 50 years and now I'm alone.
translation.zh: 我有个五十年的伴侣 现在我一个人了

translation.en: Are you still going to that grief group?
translation.zh: 你还是去那个缅怀小组吗？

translation.en: -Oh, God, no. -Why not?
translation.zh: -天啊 不 -为什么不去了？

translation.en: All those women with red noses and Skechers.
translation.zh: 那些女人都有红鼻子 穿着思凯捷

translation.en: -All they do is sit around and complain. -What an annoying grief group.
translation.zh: -她们坐在一起抱怨 -多么讨厌的缅怀小组

translation.en: When it's my turn, there's no time left to talk about me.
translation.zh: 轮到我时 就没时间谈我的事了

translation.en: -Right. -I have problems. I can't help them.
translation.zh: -对 -我有问题 帮不了她们

translation.en: Well, what about seeing someone one-on-one?
translation.zh: 一对一地见见某人呢？

translation.en: -What do you mean? -You know, just you and them.
translation.zh: -你什么意思？ -只有你和他们

translation.en: -Who? -Just a person.
translation.zh: -谁？ -只是一个人

translation.en: -What kind of person? -A normal person
translation.zh: -什么人？ -一个正常人

translation.en: with an office and a prescription pad.
translation.zh: 有办公室和处方

translation.en: -You mean a psychiatrist. -That could work, too.
translation.zh: -你说的是精神病医生 -这样也管用

translation.en: -You want me to go to therapy. -Till you get back on your feet.
translation.zh: -你想让我去接受治疗 -直到你恢复正常

translation.en: I knew it. You have been trying to get me to a therapist
translation.zh: 我就知道你一直想让我去接受治疗

translation.en: ever since you saw that Tony Soprano show.
translation.zh: 自从你看过托尼瑟普拉诺的节目之后

translation.en: I have not. He did make it look cool though, right?
translation.zh: 我没有 但他做得很酷 对吧？

translation.en: -No. -What's the big deal?
translation.zh: -不对 -有什么问题？

translation.en: I'm not crazy.
translation.zh: 我又没疯

translation.en: No. You're in pain. This is uncharted territory.
translation.zh: 没有 你很伤心 这是未知的领域

translation.en: If it might help, what's the harm?
translation.zh: 如果有帮助的话 有什么害处呢？

translation.en: -I'll think about it. -Okay. But really consider it.
translation.zh: -我会考虑一下 -好 要仔细想想

translation.en: -I will. -And if you do it, commit.
translation.zh: -我会的 -如果你要做 就做吧

translation.en: You know, really go for it.
translation.zh: 真的去做吧

translation.en: -I will. -Jump in with both feet.
translation.zh: -我会的 -全身投入

translation.en: Five, six days a week. Really Woody Allen the hell out of it.
translation.zh: 每周五六天 就像伍迪艾伦在电影里那样

translation.en: -I got it. -'Cause he's totally normal now.
translation.zh: -我知道了 -因为他现在很正常

translation.en: I promise, Lorelai.
translation.zh: 我保证 罗蕾莱

translation.en: I'd better try to get my bedroom set back.
translation.zh: 我最好把卧室恢复原样

translation.en: Okay, but first, don't you think you want to...
translation.zh: 好 不过首先 我觉得你不想…

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Oh, God, yes.
translation.zh: 天啊 好吧

translation.en: [troubadour] ♪ Hey, sweet Annie ♪
translation.zh: 嘿 可爱的安妮

translation.en: ♪ Don't take it so bad ♪
translation.zh: 不要太伤心

translation.en: ♪ You know the summer's coming soon ♪
translation.zh: 你知道夏天很快就要来到

translation.en: ♪ Though the interstate is choking Under salty, dirty sand ♪
translation.zh: 尽管公路上还满是撒盐的淤泥

translation.en: ♪ And it seems the sun Is hiding from the moon ♪
translation.zh: 似乎太阳躲在了月亮背后

translation.en: ♪ The snow is coming down On our New England town ♪
translation.zh: 大雪落在新英格兰小镇上

translation.en: ♪ And it's been falling all day long... ♪
translation.zh: 已经下了一整天…

translation.en: [Lorelai] Oy! Danesy-boy!
translation.zh: 丹尼斯小子！

translation.en: So dressing up of the dog extends to outside of the house now, huh?
translation.zh: 给狗穿衣服已经发展到户外了吗？

translation.en: He wanted to go public. It's a whole new world.
translation.zh: 他想要公开 那是个全新的世界

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -I can only support with love, not judgment.
translation.zh: 我只会用爱来支持他 而不是评判

translation.en: -So that's me. -Yeah. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -所以那是我 -是

translation.en: -And that's... -It's his order pad and pencil.
translation.zh: -这是… -是他的预订本和笔

translation.en: Sure, sure. And the baseball cap?
translation.zh: 没错 那个棒球帽呢？

translation.en: His head's too big. None of yours fit.
translation.zh: 他的头太大了 你的都不合适

translation.en: -Oh, okay. Let's get a drink. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好吧 咱们喝一杯吧 -好

translation.en: [Taylor] My man!
translation.zh: 兄弟！

translation.en: -Do I want to know what that's-- -No.
translation.zh: -我想知道这是… -不

translation.en: -[cell phone vibrating] -You don't. Okay. Oh.
translation.zh: -不 不行 -好吧

translation.en: -What? -Uh, nothing.
translation.zh: -什么？ -没什么

translation.en: -What's up? -It's just Paris sending me pictures of potential, you know...
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -帕里斯给我寄了些照片 是可能…

translation.en: She's tall. Want to start a basketball team?
translation.zh: 她个子很高 想组建篮球队吗？

translation.en: Uh, didn't you say we're not doing that?
translation.zh: 你没说过我们不做了？

translation.en: Oh, I e-mailed her that we're tabling it.
translation.zh: 我给她发过邮件 说我们在考虑

translation.en: -Tabling it? -Back-burnering it?
translation.zh: -在考虑？ -在搁置？

translation.en: Just tell her no.
translation.zh: 就说不做了

translation.en: -That's what tabling means. -No.
translation.zh: -我就这意思 -不

translation.en: That means you'll do it eventually. Are we doing it eventually?
translation.zh: “考虑”的意思是说你最后还是会做 我们还会做吗？

translation.en: -No. You said no. -And you said no.
translation.zh: -不 你说过不做了 -你说过不做了

translation.en: We both said no.
translation.zh: 我们都说不做了

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Don't need a surrogate.
translation.zh: 不需要代孕妈妈

translation.en: Done. Let's get that drink.
translation.zh: 完事了 我们去喝一杯

translation.en: [softly] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Two big gloggs.
translation.zh: 两大杯格拉格酒

translation.en: Hey, Kirk. Taking the day off of Ööö-bering?
translation.zh: 嘿 柯克 今天欧步放假？

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -You know, Ööö-ber.
translation.zh: -我不知道你在说什么 -欧步啊

translation.en: -No. -Kirk, Ööö--
translation.zh: -不知道 -柯克 欧…

translation.en: Stop making that noise.
translation.zh: 别出那个声音了

translation.en: If anyone from the Uber corporation or their handsome attorneys contacts you,
translation.zh: 如果伟大的优步公司或是 他们帅气的律师联系你们

translation.en: please tell them it was my brother
translation.zh: 请告诉他们欧步是我弟弟

translation.en: and not me, who recklessly violated trademark laws and perpetrated fraud.
translation.zh: 不是我 他鲁莽地侵犯了商标法 做了山寨货

translation.en: Dirk has always been a disappointment to the family.
translation.zh: 迪克一直都令家人失望

translation.en: Your gloggs. -Kirk-- -Next!
translation.zh: -你的格拉格饮料 下一位！ -柯克…

translation.en: Okay. Your car is done.
translation.zh: 好吧 你的车弄好了

translation.en: I do not guarantee it will make it home, or even out of the gas station.
translation.zh: 我不保证这样能撑到家 或是能开出加油站

translation.en: I bet it will.
translation.zh: 我打赌会的

translation.en: Come get it now. It's idling. I'm afraid to turn it off.
translation.zh: 去吧 它在空转 我怕它会熄火

translation.en: Okay, we'll be right there. Love you.
translation.zh: 好了 我们就到 爱你

translation.en: [Gypsy] Buy a new car.
translation.zh: 买辆新车吧

translation.en: -Where's Paul Anka? -He's chasing ice skaters.
translation.zh: -保罗安加呢？ -它去追滑冰的人了

translation.en: Oh, boy. Hi, Mom.
translation.zh: 天啊 嗨 妈妈

translation.en: -You answered. You never answer. -I did.
translation.zh: -你接电话了 你从来都不接的 -我接的

translation.en: -Sure I do. -Are you drunk?
translation.zh: -我当然接电话了 -你喝酒了？

translation.en: Mom, what can I help you with?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你找我有事吗？

translation.en: I just wanted you to know that I took your advice.
translation.zh: 我只想要你知道我接受了你的建议

translation.en: -Are you drunk? -I found a therapist.
translation.zh: -你喝酒了？ -我找了个治疗师

translation.en: -You're kidding. -Linda in my garden club is bipolar,
translation.zh: -你开玩笑吧 -我园艺俱乐部里的琳达有躁郁症

translation.en: so I asked if she had someone she could recommend.
translation.zh: 所以我问她是否可以推荐人给我

translation.en: -Good thinking. -She's a lovely woman.
translation.zh: -好主意 -她是个可爱的女人

translation.en: -Linda? -No. The therapist.
translation.zh: -琳达？ -不 治疗师

translation.en: Linda's a nightmare. She cries if the tea is cold.
translation.zh: 琳达很要命 如果茶凉了她都会哭

translation.en: But the therapist is wonderful. Very tasteful office.
translation.zh: 但治疗师很好 非常有品味的办公室

translation.en: She burns a candle that smells so delicious, I bought one to have at home.
translation.zh: 她点蜡烛 味道非常好闻 我买了一支带回家

translation.en: Sounds great.
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: -I could get one for you. -Sure.
translation.zh: -我可以你给买一支 -当然了

translation.en: I go there once a week and we just talk. Talk about anything.
translation.zh: 我每周去一次 我们聊天 聊些东西

translation.en: -Or nothing if there's nothing on my mind. -Sounds great, Mom.
translation.zh: -如果我想不到什么 那就不聊 -听起来不错 妈妈

translation.en: She told me to get rid of the Marie Kondo book.
translation.zh: 她让我扔掉藤麻理惠的书

translation.en: I like her already. Hey, I did something right. Law of averages.
translation.zh: -我喜欢她 我做了件对的事 -平均法则

translation.en: I bought a notebook so I can write down things I want to discuss with her.
translation.zh: 我买个了本 好把我想和她 聊的事写下来

translation.en: -That way I won't forget. -Very sensible.
translation.zh: -这样就不会忘了 -太明智了

translation.en: I told her it was your idea that I come see her. You did?
translation.zh: -我告诉她是你让我找她的 -是吗？

translation.en: I did. Thank you, Lorelai.
translation.zh: 是的 谢谢你 罗蕾莱

translation.en: Thank you for suggesting it. I think it's exactly what I needed.
translation.zh: 谢谢你建议我这样做 我想这正是我需要的

translation.en: Wow, I'm so glad, Mom. Really.
translation.zh: 我很高兴 妈妈 真的

translation.en: -I'd love for you to meet her sometime. -Sure.
translation.zh: -我想让你什么时间见见她 -当然了

translation.en: Maybe next time I go, you could come by.
translation.zh: 或许下次我去时 你也过来

translation.en: Oh, Mom, I would love to meet your therapist.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我很愿意见你的治疗师

translation.en: Really? Great. I go on Tuesday at 3:00.
translation.zh: 真的？太好了 我周二3点去

translation.en: Tuesday's probably fine.
translation.zh: 周二应该没问题

translation.en: Wonderful! Oh, you're going to love her.
translation.zh: 太好了！你会喜欢她的

translation.en: I'll text you the address? -Text away. -[Luke sighs]
translation.zh: -我把地址发给你？ -发吧

translation.en: -See you then. -See you then, Mom. Bye.
translation.zh: -到时候见 -到时见 妈妈 再见

translation.en: -What sort of attack are you having? -Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 你这是怎么了？ -你怎么了？疯了吗？ -怎么了？

translation.en: -Why? -You're going to therapy with your mother!
translation.zh: 你要和你妈妈去见治疗师！

translation.en: -No, I'm not. -Yes, you are. She wants me to meet her.
translation.zh: -不 不是的 她想让我见见她 -你就是

translation.en: -What do you think that means? -Luke, look. [scoffs]
translation.zh: -你觉得这是什么意思？ -卢克 听着

translation.en: My mother took my advice. Do you understand what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 我妈妈听了我的建议 你明白我的意思吗？

translation.en: The advice that I gave her, she took it.
translation.zh: 我给她建议 她接受了

translation.en: That's never happened before. Ever.
translation.zh: 以前从没这样过 从来没有

translation.en: She's feeling good about it and just wanted me to meet her--
translation.zh: 她现在感觉很好 想让我见见她…

translation.en: Oh, crap! I'm going to therapy with my mother!
translation.zh: 该死！我要和我妈妈去见治疗师了！

translation.en: -[Lorelai] Oh, boy. -[Luke] Come on.
translation.zh: -天啊 -走吧
